meaning list.meaning: ວິຊາການ
meaning list.sentence: The university is known for its strong academic programs.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວິທະຍາໄລແມ່ນເປັນທີ່ຮູ້ຈັກສໍາລັບໂຄງການທາງວິຊາການທີ່ເຂັ້ມແຂງຂອງຕົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ທິດສະດີ, impractical (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The discussion was purely academic and not practical.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສົນທະນາແມ່ນທິດສະດີຢ່າງແທ້ຈິງ ແລະບໍ່ແມ່ນການປະຕິບັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການເຂົ້າເຖິງ, ການຂົນສົ່ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The library provides free access to online journals.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫ້ອງສະຫມຸດໃຫ້ການເຂົ້າເຖິງວາລະສານອອນໄລນ໌ຟຣີ.

meaning list.meaning: ສາມາດບັນລຸ, ສາມາດບັນລຸ
meaning list.sentence: You can access your files from any device.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານ​ສາ​ມາດ​ເຂົ້າ​ເຖິງ​ໄຟລ​໌​ຂອງ​ທ່ານ​ຈາກ​ອຸ​ປະ​ກອນ​ໃດ​ຫນຶ່ງ​.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່ພັກ, ທີ່ພັກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The hotel provides comfortable accommodation for its guests.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງແຮມສະຫນອງທີ່ພັກສະດວກສະບາຍສໍາລັບແຂກຂອງຕົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມສາມັກຄີ, ຂໍ້ຕົກລົງ
meaning list.sentence: The two parties reached an accommodation on the issue.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສອງ​ຝ່າຍ​ໄດ້​ບັນລຸ​ຂໍ້​ຕົກລົງ​ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ບັນຫາ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: ບັນຊີ (ຊື່)
meaning list.sentence: I need to check my bank account balance.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງກວດເບິ່ງຍອດເງິນໃນບັນຊີທະນາຄານຂອງຂ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ລາຍລະອຽດ, ລາຍງານ
meaning list.sentence: She gave a detailed account of the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານ​ໄດ້​ສະ​ເໜີ​ບົດ​ລາຍ​ງານ​ລະອຽດ​ຂອງ​ກອງ​ປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜົນ​ສໍາ​ເລັດ​, ຜົນ​ສໍາ​ເລັດ (ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: Winning the championship was his greatest achievement.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຊະນະແຊ້ມແມ່ນຜົນສໍາເລັດທີ່ຍິ່ງໃຫຍ່ທີ່ສຸດຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ພຶດຕິກໍາ, ການເຄື່ອນໄຫວ
meaning list.sentence: Helping the elderly man was a kind act.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນ​ເປັນ​ສິ່ງ​ທີ່​ມີ​ຄວາມ​ເມດ​ຕາ​ທີ່​ຈະ​ຊ່ວຍ​ຜູ້​ຊາຍ​ອາ​ຍຸ.

meaning list.meaning: ກົດໝາຍ, ກົດໝາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The parliament passed a new act on education.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະສະພາ​ໄດ້​ຜ່ານ​ຮ່າງ​ກົດໝາຍ​ວ່າ​ດ້ວຍ​ການ​ສຶກສາ​ສະບັບ​ໃໝ່.

meaning list.meaning: ການໂຄສະນາ, ປະກາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company launched a new ad campaign.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ເປີດຕົວການໂຄສະນາໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຫນຶ່ງ, ເພີ່ມ (isim)
meaning list.sentence: In addition to her duties, she also manages the office.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນອກ​ຈາກ​ໜ້າ​ທີ່​ຂອງ​ລາວ​ແລ້ວ, ລາວ​ຍັງ​ເປັນ​ຜູ້​ຄຸ້ມ​ຄອງ​ຫ້ອງ​ການ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພີ່ມ (ຄະນິດສາດ) (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The teacher explained the addition of fractions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູອະທິບາຍການເພີ່ມຂອງເສດສ່ວນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊົມເຊີຍ, ມັກ
meaning list.sentence: I really admire her dedication to her work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້າ​ພະ​ເຈົ້າ​ຊົມ​ເຊີຍ​ການ​ອຸ​ທິດ​ຕົນ​ຂອງ​ທ່ານ​ໃນ​ການ​ເຮັດ​ວຽກ​ຂອງ​ທ່ານ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຍອມຮັບ
meaning list.sentence: He admitted his mistake and apologized.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຍອມຮັບຄວາມຜິດພາດຂອງລາວແລະຂໍໂທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ປ່ອຍໃຫ້ເຂົ້າ, ປ່ອຍໃຫ້ເຂົ້າ
meaning list.sentence: The museum admits visitors until 5 PM.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫໍພິພິທະ​ພັນ​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ນັກ​ທ່ອງ​ທ່ຽວ​ເຖິງ 17.00.

meaning list.meaning: ຂັ້ນສູງ, ຂັ້ນສູງ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The course is designed for advanced learners.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັກສູດໄດ້ຖືກອອກແບບສໍາລັບຜູ້ຮຽນຂັ້ນສູງ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ້າວໄປຂ້າງໜ້າ, ທັນສະໄໝ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This city is known for its advanced technology.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເມືອງນີ້ເປັນທີ່ຮູ້ຈັກສໍາລັບເຕັກໂນໂລຢີທີ່ກ້າວຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ແນະນຳ, ແນະນຳ
meaning list.sentence: The doctor advised him to exercise regularly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຫມໍແນະນໍາໃຫ້ລາວອອກກໍາລັງກາຍເປັນປົກກະຕິ.

meaning list.meaning: be able to afford (ທາງການເງິນ) (verb)
meaning list.sentence: I can’t afford to buy a new car right now.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍບໍ່ສາມາດຊື້ລົດໃໝ່ໄດ້ໃນຕອນນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ສະໜອງ, ໃຫ້ໂອກາດ (ພະຍັນຊະນະ)
meaning list.sentence: The window affords a beautiful view of the mountains.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປ່ອງຢ້ຽມມີທັດສະນະທີ່ສວຍງາມຂອງພູເຂົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ແກ່, aged (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The building is home to people aged 65 and above.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການກໍ່ສ້າງເຮືອນປະຊາຊົນອາຍຸ 65 ປີຂຶ້ນໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົວແທນ, ຕົວແທນ
meaning list.sentence: The real estate agent showed us several houses.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕົວແທນອະສັງຫາລິມະສັບໄດ້ສະແດງໃຫ້ພວກເຮົາເຫັນເຮືອນຈໍານວນຫນ້ອຍຫນຶ່ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັນຍາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They signed an agreement to work together.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ລົງນາມໃນຂໍ້ຕົກລົງທີ່ຈະເຮັດວຽກຮ່ວມກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເອກະພາບ, ຄວາມສາມັກຄີ
meaning list.sentence: There was general agreement on the need for reform.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໄດ້ມີການຕົກລົງທົ່ວໄປກ່ຽວກັບຄວາມຕ້ອງການສໍາລັບການປະຕິຮູບ.

meaning list.meaning: forward, forward (ຄຳສຸພາສິດ)
meaning list.sentence: Look straight ahead while driving.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເບິ່ງກົງໄປຂ້າງຫນ້າໃນຂະນະທີ່ຂັບລົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່ອນ, ກ່ອນ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: We planned the trip weeks ahead.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາວາງແຜນການເດີນທາງໃນອາທິດລ່ວງໜ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປົ້າໝາຍ
meaning list.sentence: She aims to become a successful artist.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຈຸດປະສົງເພື່ອກາຍເປັນນັກສິລະປິນທີ່ປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປົ້າໝາຍ, ຈຸດປະສົງ
meaning list.sentence: The aim of this project is to reduce waste.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຈຸດປະສົງຂອງໂຄງການນີ້ແມ່ນເພື່ອຫຼຸດຜ່ອນສິ່ງເສດເຫຼືອ.

meaning list.meaning: ປຸກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The fire alarm went off in the middle of the night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສັນຍານເຕືອນໄຟໄດ້ຖືກປິດໃນເວລາທ່ຽງຄືນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມກັງວົນ, ຄວາມຢ້ານກົວ
meaning list.sentence: The sudden news caused alarm among the staff.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ່າວກະທັນຫັນເຮັດໃຫ້ພະນັກງານເປັນຫ່ວງ.

meaning list.meaning: ອະລະບ້ຳ (ຊື່)
meaning list.sentence: She keeps her family photos in a special album.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເກັບຮູບຄອບຄົວໄວ້ໃນອະລະບໍ້າພິເສດ.

meaning list.meaning: ອັນລະບັ້ມເພງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Their latest album was a big hit.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອັນລະບັ້ມສຸດທ້າຍຂອງພວກເຂົາແມ່ນປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດອັນໃຫຍ່ຫຼວງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຫຼົ້າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Alcohol consumption is restricted in some countries.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນບາງປະເທດ, ການບໍລິໂພກເຫຼົ້າແມ່ນຈໍາກັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຫຼົ້າ, ເຫຼົ້າ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He prefers non-alcoholic beverages at parties.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມັກນ້ຳອັດລົມໃນງານລ້ຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ທາງເລືອກ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: We need to find an alternative solution to the problem.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງຊອກຫາວິທີແກ້ໄຂບັນຫາທາງເລືອກ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຫລາດໃຈ, ປະຫລາດໃຈ (ນາມສະກຸນ)
meaning list.sentence: She was amazed by the beauty of the sunset.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວປະຫລາດໃຈກັບຄວາມງາມຂອງຕາເວັນຕົກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມທະເຍີທະຍານ, ຄວາມມັກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: His ambition is to become a world-renowned chef.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມທະເຍີທະຍານຂອງລາວແມ່ນເພື່ອກາຍເປັນພໍ່ຄົວທີ່ມີຊື່ສຽງຂອງໂລກ.

meaning list.meaning: ທະເຍີທະຍານ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She is very ambitious and determined to succeed.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມທະເຍີທະຍານຫຼາຍແລະມີຄວາມຕັ້ງໃຈທີ່ຈະປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ວິເຄາະ, ກວດກາ
meaning list.sentence: The scientists analysed the data from the experiment.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກວິທະຍາສາດໄດ້ວິເຄາະຂໍ້ມູນທີ່ໄດ້ຮັບຈາກການທົດລອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການວິເຄາະ, ການທົບທວນຄືນ
meaning list.sentence: The analysis revealed some interesting patterns.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການວິເຄາະໄດ້ເປີດເຜີຍບາງຮູບແບບທີ່ຫນ້າສົນໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະກາດ, ປະກາດ
meaning list.sentence: The company announced its new product line today.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ປະກາດສາຍຜະລິດຕະພັນໃຫມ່ຂອງຕົນໃນມື້ນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ປະກາດ, ປະກາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The announcement about the event was posted online.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະກາດກ່ຽວກັບເຫດການດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຖືກເຜີຍແຜ່ທາງອິນເຕີເນັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ລຳຄານ, ລຳຄານ
meaning list.sentence: The loud music annoyed the neighbors.
meaning list.sentence translation: ດົນຕີດັງລົບກວນເພື່ອນບ້ານ.

meaning list.meaning: ລຳຄານ, ລຳຄານ
meaning list.sentence: She was annoyed by the constant interruptions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຖືກລົບກວນໂດຍການຂັດຂວາງຢ່າງຕໍ່ເນື່ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ລຳຄານ, ລຳຄານ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The buzzing sound from the fan is very annoying.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສຽງດັງທີ່ດັງມາຈາກພັດລົມແມ່ນໜ້າລຳຄານຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຍກ, ຫ່າງໄກ
meaning list.sentence: They live miles apart but remain close friends.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ຢູ່​ຫ່າງ​ຈາກ​ກັນ​ແຕ່​ຍັງ​ເປັນ​ຫມູ່​ເພື່ອນ​ທີ່​ໃກ້​ຊິດ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຊິ້ນສ່ວນ, ແບ່ງອອກ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The chair fell apart after years of use.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເກົ້າອີ້ຫຼຸດລົງເປັນຕ່ອນຫຼັງຈາກການນໍາໃຊ້ຫຼາຍປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂໍໂທດ
meaning list.sentence: He apologized for being late to the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ຂໍ​ໂທດ​ທີ່​ມາ​ຊ້າ​ໃນ​ການ​ປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄໍາ​ຮ້ອງ​ສະ​ຫມັກ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: Her job application was approved by the company.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃບສະໝັກວຽກຂອງລາວໄດ້ຮັບການອະນຸມັດຈາກບໍລິສັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄໍາ​ຮ້ອງ​ສະ​ຫມັກ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: The application of new technology improved productivity.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການນໍາໃຊ້ເຕັກໂນໂລຢີໃຫມ່ໄດ້ເພີ່ມປະສິດທິພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັດໝາຍ
meaning list.sentence: I have a doctor’s appointment at 3 PM.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍມີນັດພົບແພດຕອນ 3 ໂມງເຊົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ການນັດໝາຍ, ການມອບໝາຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: His appointment as manager was well-received by the team.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການແຕ່ງຕັ້ງຂອງລາວເປັນຜູ້ຈັດການໄດ້ຮັບການຍອມຮັບຈາກທີມງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮູ້ຈັກຄຸນຄ່າ
meaning list.sentence: We appreciate your hard work on this project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຂໍຂອບໃຈທີ່ທ່ານເຮັດວຽກໜັກໃນໂຄງການນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຊື່ນຊົມ
meaning list.sentence: It’s important to appreciate the beauty of nature.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເປັນສິ່ງສໍາຄັນທີ່ຈະເຂົ້າໃຈຄວາມງາມຂອງທໍາມະຊາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະມານ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The journey will take approximately three hours.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການເດີນທາງຈະໃຊ້ເວລາປະມານສາມຊົ່ວໂມງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈັບ
meaning list.sentence: The police arrested the suspect yesterday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຳຫຼວດໄດ້ຈັບຜູ້ຕ້ອງສົງໄສໃນມື້ວານນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ການຈັບກຸມ
meaning list.sentence: The arrest was carried out without any resistance.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ຈັບ​ກຸມ​ໄດ້​ດຳ​ເນີນ​ໄປ​ໂດຍ​ບໍ່​ມີ​ການ​ຕ້ານ​ຢັນ​ໃດໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ມາຮອດ, ມາຮອດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The train’s arrival was delayed by an hour.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການມາເຖິງຂອງລົດໄຟໄດ້ຖືກຊັກຊ້າໂດຍຫນຶ່ງຊົ່ວໂມງ.

meaning list.meaning: Task, assignment (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The teacher gave us a writing assignment for the weekend.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຈານໄດ້ມອບວຽກຂຽນໃຫ້ໃນທ້າຍອາທິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊ່ວຍ
meaning list.sentence: The nurse assisted the doctor during the surgery.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະຍາບານໄດ້ຊ່ວຍທ່ານຫມໍໃນລະຫວ່າງການຜ່າຕັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ບັນຍາກາດ, ຊັ້ນອາກາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The atmosphere of Earth protects us from harmful solar radiation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊັ້ນບັນຍາກາດຂອງໂລກປົກປ້ອງພວກເຮົາຈາກລັງສີແສງຕາເວັນທີ່ເປັນອັນຕະລາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ອາກາດ, ສະພາບແວດລ້ອມ
meaning list.sentence: The restaurant has a cozy and friendly atmosphere.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮ້ານອາຫານມີບັນຍາກາດທີ່ອົບອຸ່ນແລະເປັນມິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພີ່ມ, ຄັດຕິດ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: Please attach the document to your email.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາແນບເອກະສານໃສ່ອີເມວຂອງທ່ານ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊື່ອມ​ໂຍງ, ເຊື່ອມ​ໂຍງ
meaning list.sentence: He is deeply attached to his family.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມຕັ້ງໃຈຢ່າງເລິກເຊິ່ງຕໍ່ຄອບຄົວຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ທັດສະນະຄະຕິ, ທັດສະນະຄະຕິ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her positive attitude helped her succeed in difficult situations.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທັດສະນະຄະຕິໃນທາງບວກຂອງລາວໄດ້ຊ່ວຍໃຫ້ລາວປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດໃນສະຖານະການທີ່ຫຍຸ້ງຍາກ.

meaning list.meaning: ດຶງດູດ, ດຶງດູດ
meaning list.sentence: The bright flowers attract many bees.
meaning list.sentence translation: ດອກໄມ້ສົດໃສດຶງດູດເຜິ້ງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ດຶງດູດ, ດຶງດູດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The city’s main attraction is its historic castle.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຈຸດດຶງດູດຕົ້ນຕໍຂອງນະຄອນແມ່ນ Castle ປະຫວັດສາດຂອງຕົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ອຳນາດ, ອຳນາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The teacher has the authority to discipline students.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູມີສິດອຳນາດໃນລະບຽບວິໄນຂອງນັກຮຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ບຸກຄົນ ຫຼືສະຖາບັນທີ່ໄດ້ຮັບອະນຸຍາດ (ຊື່)
meaning list.sentence: The local authority is responsible for road maintenance.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອຳນາດການປົກຄອງທ້ອງຖິ່ນມີຄວາມຮັບຜິດຊອບໃນການຮັກສາເສັ້ນທາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດຍສະເລ່ຍ, ຊອກຫາສະເລ່ຍ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The company averages a growth rate of 5% per year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດມີອັດຕາການເຕີບໂຕສະເລ່ຍ 5% ຕໍ່ປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຫ້ລາງວັນ
meaning list.sentence: She was awarded a prize for her outstanding performance.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບລາງວັນສໍາລັບການປະຕິບັດງານດີເດັ່ນຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮູ້, ແຈ້ງ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She is fully aware of the challenges ahead.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຮູ້​ຢ່າງ​ເຕັມ​ທີ່​ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ການ​ທ້າ​ທາຍ​ຕໍ່​ໜ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖອຍຫຼັງ
meaning list.sentence: He took a step backwards to avoid the falling object.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ກ້າວ​ຖອຍ​ຫລັງ​ເພື່ອ​ຫຼີກ​ລ່ຽງ​ສິ່ງ​ຂອງ​ທີ່​ຕົກ.

meaning list.meaning: ລ້າຫຼັງ
meaning list.sentence: The region is economically backwards compared to others.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພາກພື້ນແມ່ນດ້ອຍພັດທະນາທາງດ້ານເສດຖະກິດເມື່ອທຽບໃສ່ກັບປະເທດອື່ນໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຕ່ງກິນ
meaning list.sentence: She loves to bake cakes and cookies on weekends.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງມັກອົບເຄ້ກແລະຄຸກກີໃນທ້າຍອາທິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍອດເງິນ
meaning list.sentence: Maintaining a work-life balance is important.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເປັນສິ່ງສໍາຄັນທີ່ຈະຮັກສາຄວາມສົມດຸນຂອງຊີວິດການເຮັດວຽກ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອດຸ່ນດ່ຽງ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: She balanced the books on her head effortlessly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວດຸ່ນດ່ຽງປຶ້ມເທິງຫົວຂອງລາວຢ່າງບໍ່ຢຸດຢັ້ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫ້າມ
meaning list.sentence: The government banned smoking in public places.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານຫ້າມສູບຢາໃນສະຖານທີ່ສາທາລະນະ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫ້າມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The ban on plastic bags has been widely accepted.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຫ້າມຖົງຢາງໄດ້ຖືກຍອມຮັບຢ່າງກວ້າງຂວາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ແມ່ນ້ຳຂອງ
meaning list.sentence: We had a picnic on the bank of the river.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາໄດ້ກິນເຂົ້າປ່າຢູ່ແຄມແມ່ນ້ຳ.

meaning list.meaning: ພື້ນຖານ, ພື້ນຖານ
meaning list.sentence: The base of the statue is made of marble.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພື້ນຖານຂອງຮູບປັ້ນແມ່ນເຮັດດ້ວຍຫີນອ່ອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ອົດທົນ
meaning list.sentence: The decision was based on thorough research.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຕັດສິນໃຈແມ່ນອີງໃສ່ການຄົ້ນຄວ້າຢ່າງກວ້າງຂວາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ພື້ນຖານ, ງ່າຍດາຍ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The course covers the basic principles of physics.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັກສູດດັ່ງກ່າວກວມເອົາຫຼັກການພື້ນຖານຂອງຟີຊິກ.

meaning list.meaning: ພື້ນຖານ, ທີ່ສໍາຄັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Trust is the basis of a good relationship.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມໄວ້ວາງໃຈແມ່ນພື້ນຖານຂອງສາຍພົວພັນທີ່ດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ແບັດເຕີຣີ, ແບັດເຕີຣີ
meaning list.sentence: The battery in my phone needs to be replaced.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແບັດເຕີຣີໃນໂທລະສັບຂອງຂ້ອຍຕ້ອງຖືກປ່ຽນແທນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົງຄາມ, ການຕໍ່ສູ້
meaning list.sentence: The battle lasted for several hours.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ສູ້​ຮົບ​ໄດ້​ແກ່​ຍາວ​ຫຼາຍ​ຊົ່ວ​ໂມງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມງາມ
meaning list.sentence: The beauty of the sunset took her breath away.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມງາມຂອງຕາເວັນຕົກໄດ້ເອົາລົມຫາຍໃຈຂອງລາວອອກໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຜິ້ງ
meaning list.sentence: The bee collected nectar from the flowers.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຜິ້ງໄດ້ເກັບນ້ຳຫວານຈາກດອກໄມ້.

meaning list.meaning: ສັດທາ
meaning list.sentence: Her belief in hard work led to her success.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມເຊື່ອຂອງລາວໃນການເຮັດວຽກຫນັກໄດ້ຮັບປະກັນຄວາມສໍາເລັດຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະດິ່ງ, ກະດິ່ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The church bell rang at noon.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລະຄັງໂບດດັງຂຶ້ນໃນຕອນທ່ຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ບິດ, ບິດ
meaning list.sentence: She bent the wire to fit the frame.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວງໍສາຍໃຫ້ພໍດີກັບກອບ.

meaning list.meaning: ງໍ, ຈຸດຫັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The road has a sharp bend ahead.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີໂຄ້ງແຫຼມຢູ່ຂ້າງຫນ້າຢູ່ໃນເສັ້ນທາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະໂຫຍດ
meaning list.sentence: The new policy will benefit small businesses.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນະໂຍບາຍໃຫມ່ຈະເປັນປະໂຫຍດແກ່ທຸລະກິດຂະຫນາດນ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ສິ່ງທີ່ດີກວ່າຫຼືບຸກຄົນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She always strives to be better than before.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະຍາຍາມໃຫ້ດີກ່ວາເກົ່າສະເໝີ.

meaning list.meaning: ແນ່ນອນ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: I absolutely agree with your opinion on this matter.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້າພະເຈົ້າຕົກລົງເຫັນດີກັບຄວາມຄິດເຫັນຂອງທ່ານກ່ຽວກັບເລື່ອງນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມບູນ
meaning list.sentence: The room was absolutely silent after the announcement.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫ້ອງ​ນັ້ນ​ມິດ​ງຽບ​ໝົດ​ຫຼັງ​ຈາກ​ການ​ປະກາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ແນ່ນອນ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: Can you help me with this task? Absolutely!
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າສາມາດຊ່ວຍຂ້ອຍໃນເລື່ອງນີ້ໄດ້ບໍ? ແນ່ນອນ!

meaning list.meaning: ກັດ
meaning list.sentence: The dog tried to bite the mailman.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໝາພະຍາຍາມກັດຊາຍໄປສະນີ.

meaning list.meaning: ກັດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He took a bite of the sandwich.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ກິນແຊນວິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕັນ, ຕຶກອາຄານ
meaning list.sentence: The children were playing with colorful blocks.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍໄດ້ຫຼີ້ນກັບທ່ອນໄມ້ສີ.

meaning list.meaning: ບລັອກ
meaning list.sentence: A fallen tree blocked the road.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕົ້ນໄມ້ທີ່ລົ້ມລົງໄດ້ກີດຂວາງເສັ້ນທາງ.

meaning list.sentence: We boarded the train just in time.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຂຶ້ນລົດໄຟໃນເວລາດຽວ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະເບີດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The bomb exploded in the city center.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລະ​ເບີດ​ໄດ້​ແຕກ​ຂຶ້ນ​ຢູ່​ໃຈກາງ​ເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະເບີດ
meaning list.sentence: The planes bombed the enemy's positions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຮືອ​ບິນ​ໄດ້​ຖິ້ມ​ລະ​ເບີດ​ໃສ່​ຕໍາ​ແໜ່ງ​ສັດ​ຕູ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊາຍແດນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They crossed the border without any issues.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າຂ້າມຊາຍແດນໂດຍບໍ່ມີບັນຫາ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົບກວນ
meaning list.sentence: I don't want to bother you with my problems.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍບໍ່ຕ້ອງການລົບກວນເຈົ້າກັບບັນຫາຂອງຂ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ສາຂາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The bird sat on a high branch of the tree.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນົກ​ຊະ​ນິດ​ໄດ້​ລົງ​ຈອດ​ກັບ​ກິ່ງ​ງ່າ​ສູງ​ຂອງ​ຕົ້ນ​ໄມ້​.

meaning list.meaning: ສາຂາ (ຊື່)
meaning list.sentence: This bank has a branch in every major city.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະນາຄານນີ້ມີສາຂາຢູ່ທຸກເມືອງໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.sentence: She prefers buying clothes from well-known brands.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງມັກຊື້ເຄື່ອງນຸ່ງຈາກຍີ່ຫໍ້ທີ່ມີຊື່ສຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕຳນິ
meaning list.sentence: The cattle were branded with the ranch's logo.
meaning list.sentence translation: ງົວຖືກຕີດ້ວຍໂລໂກ້ຂອງຟາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ້າຫານ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The brave firefighter saved the child from the fire.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກດັບເພີງທີ່ກ້າຫານໄດ້ຊ່ວຍເດັກນ້ອຍອອກຈາກໄຟ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົມຫາຍໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: She took a deep breath before diving into the water.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຫາຍໃຈເລິກໆກ່ອນທີ່ຈະດຳລົງໄປໃນນ້ຳ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫາຍໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: It's hard to breathe at high altitudes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນຍາກທີ່ຈະຫາຍໃຈຢູ່ບ່ອນສູງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫາຍໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: His breathing was steady despite the effort.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຖິງວ່າຈະມີຄວາມພະຍາຍາມຂອງລາວ, ການຫາຍໃຈຂອງລາວແມ່ນສະຫມໍ່າສະເຫມີ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຈົ້າສາວ
meaning list.sentence: The bride looked stunning in her wedding dress.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າສາວເບິ່ງງາມໃນຊຸດແຕ່ງງານຂອງນາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຟອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The children were playing with soap bubbles.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍໄດ້ຫຼິ້ນກັບຟອງສະບູ.

meaning list.meaning: ຝັງ
meaning list.sentence: They buried the treasure under the old oak tree.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ຝັງ​ຊັບ​ສົມບັດ​ໄວ້​ໃຕ້​ຕົ້ນ​ໂອກ​ເກົ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫງົບ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The lake was calm and peaceful in the morning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະເລສາບສະຫງົບແລະສະຫງົບໃນຕອນເຊົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫງົບລົງ
meaning list.sentence: He tried to calm the frightened child.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວພະຍາຍາມເຮັດໃຫ້ເດັກຊາຍທີ່ຢ້ານກົວນັ້ນສະຫງົບລົງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມສະຫງົບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She enjoyed the calm of the countryside.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມັກຄວາມງຽບສະຫງົບຂອງຊົນນະບົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຄມເປນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The election campaign lasted for three months.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ໂຄສະນາ​ຫາ​ສຽງ​ເລືອກ​ຕັ້ງ​ໄດ້​ແກ່ຍາວ​ເປັນ​ເວລາ 3 ​ເດືອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອດໍາເນີນການແຄມເປນ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: They are campaigning for environmental awareness.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າໂຄສະນາປູກຈິດສໍານຶກດ້ານສິ່ງແວດລ້ອມ.

meaning list.meaning: ວິທະຍາເຂດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The university campus is very large and well-maintained.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວິທະຍາເຂດມະຫາວິທະຍາໄລແມ່ນໃຫຍ່ຫຼາຍ ແລະຖືກຮັກສາໄວ້ເປັນຢ່າງດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ສະໝັກ
meaning list.sentence: She is a strong candidate for the manager position.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນຜູ້ສະຫມັກທີ່ເຂັ້ມແຂງສໍາລັບຕໍາແຫນ່ງຜູ້ຈັດການ.

meaning list.meaning: ໝວກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He wore a cap to protect himself from the sun.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໃສ່ຫມວກເພື່ອປົກປ້ອງຕົນເອງຈາກແສງແດດ.

meaning list.meaning: Captain (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The captain of the ship gave the crew their orders.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາຍເຮືອໄດ້ອອກຄຳສັ່ງໃຫ້ລູກເຮືອ.

meaning list.meaning: careless (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: A careless mistake caused the machine to stop working.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຜິດພາດທີ່ບໍ່ສົນໃຈເຮັດໃຫ້ເຄື່ອງຢຸດເຮັດວຽກ.

meaning list.meaning: ໝວດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Books are organized into different categories in the library.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນຫ້ອງສະຫມຸດ, ປຶ້ມຖືກແບ່ງອອກເປັນປະເພດຕ່າງໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພດານ
meaning list.sentence: The room has a high ceiling with beautiful decorations.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫ້ອງມີເພດານສູງທີ່ມີການຕົບແຕ່ງທີ່ສວຍງາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະເຫຼີມສະຫຼອງ
meaning list.sentence: The celebration of the New Year lasted all night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສະເຫລີມສະຫລອງປີໃໝ່ໄດ້ດຳເນີນໄປຕະຫຼອດຄືນ.

meaning list.meaning: ກາງ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The central station is the busiest place in the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະຖານີສູນກາງແມ່ນສະຖານທີ່ທີ່ຫຍຸ້ງທີ່ສຸດໃນເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ກາງ
meaning list.sentence: The discussion was centred around economic issues.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ໂຕ້​ວາ​ທີ​ແມ່ນ​ສຸມ​ໃສ່​ບັນ​ຫາ​ເສດ​ຖະ​ກິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ພິທີ
meaning list.sentence: The graduation ceremony was held in the main hall.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພິທີ​ຮັບ​ປະລິນຍາ​ໄດ້​ຈັດ​ຂຶ້ນ​ຢູ່​ຫໍ​ໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ໂສ້ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The dog was tied to a tree with a chain.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໝາຖືກຕ່ອງໂສ້ໃສ່ຕົ້ນໄມ້.

meaning list.meaning: ສິ່ງທ້າທາຍ, ຄວາມຫຍຸ້ງຍາກ
meaning list.sentence: Climbing Mount Everest is a huge challenge.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປີນພູ Everest ແມ່ນສິ່ງທ້າທາຍອັນໃຫຍ່ຫຼວງ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຊ້ມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He became the world champion after winning the tournament.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງຈາກຊະນະການແຂ່ງຂັນ, ລາວໄດ້ກາຍເປັນແຊ້ມໂລກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊ່ອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They watched the news on a popular TV channel.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າເບິ່ງຂ່າວໃນຊ່ອງໂທລະພາບຍອດນິຍົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ພະແນກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The first chapter of the book introduces the main characters.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສ່ວນທໍາອິດຂອງປື້ມແນະນໍາລັກສະນະຕົ້ນຕໍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄ່າທຳນຽມ
meaning list.sentence: The hotel charges a fee for parking.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງແຮມຄິດຄ່າບໍລິການບ່ອນຈອດລົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄລ່
meaning list.sentence: I need to charge my phone before leaving.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຕ້ອງສາກໂທລະສັບກ່ອນອອກເດີນທາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ລາຄາຖືກ
meaning list.sentence: You can travel to Europe cheaply during the off-season.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານສາມາດເດີນທາງໄປເອີຣົບໄດ້ລາຄາຖືກໃນລະດູການນອກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼອກລວງ, ຫຼອກລວງ
meaning list.sentence: He cheated during the exam and got caught.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໂກງການສອບເສັງ ແລະຖືກຈັບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼອກລວງ, ຫຼອກລວງ
meaning list.sentence: Using unfair methods in the game is considered a cheat.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການນໍາໃຊ້ວິທີການທີ່ບໍ່ຍຸຕິທໍາໃນເກມແມ່ນຖືວ່າເປັນການໂກງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊື່ນຊົມ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She is always cheerful, no matter the situation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມສຸກສະເຫມີບໍ່ວ່າສະຖານະການໃດກໍ່ຕາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຄມີ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Chemical substances must be handled with care.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສານເຄມີຄວນໄດ້ຮັບການປະຕິບັດຢ່າງລະມັດລະວັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສານເຄມີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The factory produces chemicals for industrial use.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງງານຜະລິດສານເຄມີສໍາລັບການນໍາໃຊ້ອຸດສາຫະກໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫນ້າເອິກ
meaning list.sentence: He felt a pain in his chest after running.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງຈາກແລ່ນ, ລາວຮູ້ສຶກເຈັບປວດຢູ່ໃນຫນ້າເອິກ.

meaning list.meaning: ເດັກນ້ອຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She often talks about her happy childhood memories.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມັກຈະເວົ້າກ່ຽວກັບຄວາມຊົງຈໍາໃນໄວເດັກທີ່ມີຄວາມສຸກ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່າວຫາ
meaning list.sentence: He claims to have seen a UFO.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວອ້າງວ່າໄດ້ເຫັນ UFO.

meaning list.meaning: ອ້າງ
meaning list.sentence: She filed a claim for damages after the accident.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ຮ້ອງ​ຂໍ​ເງິນ​ຊົດ​ເຊີຍ​ຄ່າ​ເສຍ​ຫາຍ​ຫຼັງ​ຈາກ​ເກີດ​ອຸ​ບັດ​ຕິ​ເຫດ.

meaning list.meaning: ວະລີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The contract contains several important clauses.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສັນຍາປະກອບມີຫຼາຍຂໍ້ທີ່ສໍາຄັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ອະນາໄມ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: Please clear the table before we serve dinner.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາເຮັດຄວາມສະອາດໂຕະກ່ອນຮັບປະທານອາຫານ.

meaning list.meaning: ກົດ (ຄໍາ​ກິລິຍາ​)
meaning list.sentence: Click on the link to access the website.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃຫ້ຄລິກໃສ່ການເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ເພື່ອເຂົ້າຫາເວັບໄຊທ໌.

meaning list.meaning: ສຽງຄລິກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: I heard a click as the door locked.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍໄດ້ຍິນສຽງຄລິກເມື່ອປະຕູຖືກລັອກ.

meaning list.meaning: ລູກຄ້າ (ຊື່)
meaning list.sentence: The lawyer met with her client to discuss the case.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະນາຍຄວາມໄດ້ພົບກັບລູກຄ້າຂອງລາວເພື່ອປຶກສາຫາລືກ່ຽວກັບກໍລະນີ.

meaning list.meaning: ປີນ
meaning list.sentence: The climb to the top of the mountain took hours.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ປີນ​ຂຶ້ນ​ໄປ​ເທິງ​ພູ​ໄດ້​ໃຊ້​ເວລາ​ຫຼາຍ​ຊົ່ວ​ໂມງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃກ້ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The shop is close to my house.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮ້ານຢູ່ໃກ້ກັບບ້ານຂ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜ້າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The dress was made from a soft, colorful cloth.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຄື່ອງນຸ່ງດັ່ງກ່າວແມ່ນເຮັດຈາກຜ້າອ່ອນໆແລະມີສີສັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຳໃບ້ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The detective found a clue that led to the suspect.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກສືບໄດ້ພົບເຫັນຂໍ້ຄຶດທີ່ນໍາໄປສູ່ຜູ້ຕ້ອງສົງໄສ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຶກສາ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She coaches a local soccer team on weekends.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຝຶກອົບຮົມທີມງານບານເຕະທ້ອງຖິ່ນໃນທ້າຍອາທິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖ່ານຫີນ
meaning list.sentence: The old train runs on coal.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດໄຟເກົ່າແລ່ນໃສ່ຖ່ານຫີນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼຽນ
meaning list.sentence: She dropped a coin into the vending machine.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເອົາຫຼຽນໜຶ່ງໃສ່ເຄື່ອງຂາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ເກັບ​ກໍາ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: He has an impressive collection of rare stamps.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີສະແຕມທີ່ຫາຍາກໃນການເກັບກໍາທີ່ຫນ້າປະທັບໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ສີສັນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The walls were decorated with brightly coloured paintings.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຝາ​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ການ​ຕົກ​ແຕ່ງ​ດ້ວຍ​ສີ​ທີ່​ສົດ​ໃສ.

meaning list.meaning: ລວມ
meaning list.sentence: You need to combine the ingredients to make the dough.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເພື່ອເຮັດໃຫ້ dough, ທ່ານຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງໄດ້ສົມທົບສ່ວນປະກອບສໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຳເຫັນ
meaning list.sentence: He commented on the importance of teamwork.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ສະແດງຄວາມຄິດເຫັນກ່ຽວກັບຄວາມສໍາຄັນຂອງການເຮັດວຽກເປັນທີມ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຄ້າ
meaning list.sentence: The commercial district of the city is always busy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂດ​ການ​ຄ້າ​ຂອງ​ນະ​ຄອນ​ແມ່ນ​ສະ​ເຫມີ​ໄປ​ທຸ​ລະ​ກິດ​.

meaning list.meaning: ການໂຄສະນາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The new commercial for the product was very creative.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄສະນາໃຫມ່ສໍາລັບຜະລິດຕະພັນແມ່ນສ້າງສັນຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະມວນຜົນ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: He committed a serious crime.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວກະທໍາຜິດຮ້າຍແຮງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕິດຕໍ່ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Effective communication is key in any relationship.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສື່ສານທີ່ມີປະສິດທິພາບແມ່ນສໍາຄັນໃນການພົວພັນໃດໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ການປຽບທຽບ
meaning list.sentence: The comparison between the two products revealed many differences.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປຽບທຽບລະຫວ່າງສອງຜະລິດຕະພັນສະແດງໃຫ້ເຫັນຄວາມແຕກຕ່າງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄູ່ແຂ່ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company is trying to stay ahead of its competitors.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດກໍາລັງພະຍາຍາມຢູ່ລ່ວງຫນ້າຂອງຄູ່ແຂ່ງຂອງຕົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການແຂ່ງຂັນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The job market is extremely competitive.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕະຫຼາດວຽກແມ່ນການແຂ່ງຂັນທີ່ສຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຳຮ້ອງທຸກ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The customer filed a complaint about the poor service.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລູກຄ້າໄດ້ຍື່ນຄໍາຮ້ອງທຸກກ່ຽວກັບການບໍລິການທີ່ບໍ່ດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊັບຊ້ອນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The issue is more complex than it seems.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບັນຫາແມ່ນສັບສົນຫຼາຍກ່ວາມັນເບິ່ງຄືວ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຸມ
meaning list.sentence: She needs to concentrate on her studies.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕ້ອງການສຸມໃສ່ການສຶກສາຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫຼຸບ
meaning list.sentence: The report concludes that more research is needed.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບົດລາຍງານສະຫຼຸບວ່າຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງມີການຄົ້ນຄວ້າເພີ່ມເຕີມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜົນໄດ້ຮັບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The conclusion of the meeting was a success.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໝາກຜົນ​ຂອງ​ກອງ​ປະຊຸມ​ແມ່ນ​ປະສົບ​ຜົນສຳ​ເລັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໝັ້ນໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: She is confident about her chances of success.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມຫມັ້ນໃຈກ່ຽວກັບໂອກາດຂອງລາວທີ່ຈະປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ອະນຸມັດ
meaning list.sentence: The hotel confirmed our reservation by email.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງແຮມໄດ້ຢືນຢັນການຈອງຂອງພວກເຮົາທາງອີເມວ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັບສົນ
meaning list.sentence: The long explanation confused the students.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄໍາອະທິບາຍຍາວເຮັດໃຫ້ນັກຮຽນສັບສົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັບສົນ, ບໍ່ສາມາດຈຳແນກໄດ້
meaning list.sentence: She confused sugar with salt while baking.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນຂະນະທີ່ແຕ່ງຢູ່ຄົວກິນ, ລາວໄດ້ປະສົມ້ໍາຕານກັບເກືອ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັບຊ້ອນ
meaning list.sentence: I felt confused by the complicated instructions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍສັບສົນກັບຄໍາແນະນໍາທີ່ສັບສົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັບສົນ, ບໍ່ເປັນລະບຽບ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The room looked confused after the party.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫ້ອງເບິ່ງ chaotic ຫຼັງຈາກງານລ້ຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The internet connection is very slow today.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ອິນເຕີເນັດຊ້າຫຼາຍໃນມື້ນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມສຳພັນ, ຄວາມສຳພັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There is a strong connection between exercise and health.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີການເຊື່ອມໂຍງທີ່ເຂັ້ມແຂງລະຫວ່າງອອກກໍາລັງກາຍແລະສຸຂະພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜົນໄດ້ຮັບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The consequence of his actions was a fine.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜົນຂອງການກະທໍາຂອງພວກເຂົາແມ່ນການລົງໂທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມສຳຄັນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The decision is of great consequence for the company.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຕັດສິນໃຈແມ່ນມີຄວາມສໍາຄັນຫຼາຍສໍາລັບບໍລິສັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເກີດຂຶ້ນ, ເກີດຂຶ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: The team consists of five members.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທີມງານປະກອບດ້ວຍຫ້າສະມາຊິກ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍລິໂພກ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: This car consumes a lot of fuel.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດຄັນນີ້ບໍລິໂພກນໍ້າມັນຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຊ້ຈ່າຍ
meaning list.sentence: She consumes most of her time working.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໃຊ້ເວລາສ່ວນໃຫຍ່ເຮັດວຽກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ບໍລິໂພກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company focuses on consumer satisfaction.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດສຸມໃສ່ຄວາມພໍໃຈຂອງຜູ້ບໍລິໂພກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕິດຕໍ່ພົວພັນ, ການເຊື່ອມຕໍ່
meaning list.sentence: Please leave your contact details at the reception.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາຝາກຂໍ້ມູນການຕິດຕໍ່ຂອງທ່ານໄວ້ທີ່ຫ້ອງຮັບແຂກ.

meaning list.meaning: ສື່ສານ
meaning list.sentence: You can contact me via email.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານ​ສາ​ມາດ​ຕິດ​ຕໍ່​ຫາ​ຂ້າ​ພະ​ເຈົ້າ​ຜ່ານ​ທາງ​ອີ​ເມລ​໌​.

meaning list.meaning: ຕູ້ຄອນເທນເນີ, ເຮືອ
meaning list.sentence: The container is full of fresh fruits.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບັນຈຸແມ່ນເຕັມໄປດ້ວຍຫມາກໄມ້ສົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເນື້ອໃນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The content of the website is very informative.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເນື້ອໃນຂອງເວັບໄຊທ໌ແມ່ນມີຂໍ້ມູນຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມພໍໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: He expressed his content with the results.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສະແດງຄວາມພໍໃຈກັບຜົນໄດ້ຮັບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ່າງຕໍ່ເນື່ອງ, ຢ່າງຕໍ່ເນື່ອງ
meaning list.sentence: There was a continuous noise from the construction site.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີ​ສຽງ​ດັງ​ມາ​ຈາກ​ບ່ອນ​ກໍ່ສ້າງ​ຢ່າງ​ບໍ່​ຢຸດ​ຢັ້ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ກົງກັນຂ້າມ, ກົງກັນຂ້າມ
meaning list.sentence: The contrast between the two paintings is striking.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມແຕກຕ່າງລະຫວ່າງສອງຮູບພາບແມ່ນໂດດເດັ່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປຽບທຽບ, ກົງກັນຂ້າມ
meaning list.sentence: Her calm demeanor contrasts sharply with his aggression.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທັດສະນະທີ່ສະຫງົບຂອງລາວກົງກັນຂ້າມກັບຄວາມຮຸກຮານຂອງນາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ມີປະໂຫຍດ, ສະດວກ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This location is very convenient for public transportation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະຖານທີ່ນີ້ແມ່ນສະດວກຫຼາຍສໍາລັບການຂົນສົ່ງສາທາລະນະ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊັກຊວນ
meaning list.sentence: She managed to convince him to join the team.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຈັດການເພື່ອຊັກຊວນໃຫ້ລາວເຂົ້າຮ່ວມທີມ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຢັນ
meaning list.sentence: The soup needs to cool before serving.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແກງຕ້ອງເຢັນກ່ອນທີ່ຈະຮັບໃຊ້.

meaning list.meaning: ເຄື່ອງແຕ່ງກາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The children wore colorful costumes for the play.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍໃສ່ເຄື່ອງນຸ່ງທີ່ມີສີສັນສໍາລັບເກມ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຮືອນ​ປະ​ເທດ, cottage (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They spent the weekend at a cozy cottage by the lake.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າໃຊ້ເວລາທ້າຍອາທິດຢູ່ທີ່ບ້ານພັກແຄມທະເລສາບທີ່ສະດວກສະບາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຝ້າຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The shirt is made of 100% cotton.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເສື້ອຍືດແມ່ນເຮັດດ້ວຍຝ້າຍ 100%.

meaning list.meaning: ນັບ, ຕົວເລກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The final count showed 150 participants.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການນັບຄັ້ງສຸດທ້າຍສະແດງໃຫ້ເຫັນຜູ້ເຂົ້າຮ່ວມ 150 ຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊົນນະບົດ, ຊົນນະບົດ
meaning list.sentence: They prefer living in the countryside to the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ມັກ​ອາ​ໄສ​ຢູ່​ໃນ​ຊົນ​ນະ​ບົດ​ຫຼາຍ​ກ​່​ວາ​ຢູ່​ໃນ​ຕົວ​ເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The case will be heard in court next week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄະດີດັ່ງກ່າວຈະຖືກພິຈາລະນາໃນສານໃນອາທິດໜ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະໜາມກິລາ
meaning list.sentence: The basketball court was newly renovated.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະຫນາມບານບ້ວງພຽງແຕ່ໄດ້ຮັບການປັບປຸງໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຄອບຄຸມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The book's cover is beautifully designed.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໜ້າປົກຂອງປຶ້ມຖືກອອກແບບຢ່າງສວຍງາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ການປົກປ້ອງ, ໄສ້ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They took cover under the trees during the storm.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ລີ້​ໄພ​ຢູ່​ໃຕ້​ຕົ້ນ​ໄມ້​ໃນ​ລະ​ຫວ່າງ​ພະ​ຍຸ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຄືອບ
meaning list.sentence: The road was covered with snow after the storm.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງຈາກພະຍຸ, ຖະຫນົນຫົນທາງໄດ້ຖືກປົກຄຸມດ້ວຍຫິມະ.

meaning list.meaning: ສີຄີມ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She chose cream curtains for the living room.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງໄດ້ເລືອກຜ້າມ່ານສີຄີມສໍາລັບຫ້ອງຮັບແຂກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜິດ, ອາດຊະຍາກຳ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The criminal activities were investigated by the police.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກິດຈະກໍາທາງອາຍາໄດ້ຖືກສືບສວນໂດຍຕໍາຫຼວດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຫດຮ້າຍ, ບໍ່ມີເມດຕາ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: It was cruel to leave the dog outside in the rain.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປ່ອຍໃຫ້ໝາອອກໄປໃນຝົນແມ່ນໂຫດຮ້າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ວັດທະນະທໍາ
meaning list.sentence: The festival celebrates the cultural diversity of the region.
meaning list.sentence translation: ງານ​ບຸນ​ສະ​ເຫຼີມ​ສະ​ຫຼອງ​ຄວາມ​ຫຼາກ​ຫຼາຍ​ດ້ານ​ວັດ​ທະ​ນະ​ທໍາ​ຂອງ​ພາກ​ພື້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະກຸນເງິນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The euro is the currency used in many European countries.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເງິນເອີໂຣແມ່ນສະກຸນເງິນທີ່ໃຊ້ໃນຫຼາຍປະເທດເອີຣົບ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຈຸບັນ, ປະຈຸບັນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The current situation is under control.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະຖານະການໃນປະຈຸບັນແມ່ນຢູ່ພາຍໃຕ້ການຄວບຄຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃນປັດຈຸບັນ, ຍັງ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: He is currently working on a new project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນປັດຈຸບັນລາວກໍາລັງເຮັດວຽກຢູ່ໃນໂຄງການໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຜ້າມ່ານ
meaning list.sentence: She opened the curtain to let the sunlight in.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປີດຜ້າມ່ານເພື່ອໃຫ້ແສງແດດໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ປະເພນີ, ປະເພນີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: It is a local custom to greet people with a bow.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ເປັນ​ຮີດຄອງ​ປະ​ເພນີ​ຂອງ​ທ້ອງ​ຖິ່ນ​ທີ່​ຈະ​ກົ້ມ​ຫົວ​ເມື່ອ​ທັກທາຍ​ປະຊາຊົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕັດ, ຕັດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He has a small cut on his finger.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີການຕັດເລັກນ້ອຍຢູ່ໃນນິ້ວມືຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະ​ຈໍາ​ວັນ (adverb​)
meaning list.sentence: She exercises daily to stay fit.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວອອກກໍາລັງກາຍທຸກໆມື້ເພື່ອໃຫ້ມີຮູບຮ່າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເສຍຫາຍ, ຄວາມເສຍຫາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The storm caused significant damage to the building.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົມພາຍຸດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ສ້າງຄວາມເສຍຫາຍຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍຕໍ່ອາຄານ.

meaning list.meaning: ທຳຮ້າຍ
meaning list.sentence: The heavy rains damaged the crops.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຝົນຕົກໜັກເຮັດໃຫ້ພືດຜົນເສຍຫາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັນຍາ, ຕໍ່ລອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They made a deal to share the profits equally.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ເຮັດຂໍ້ຕົກລົງທີ່ຈະແບ່ງປັນຜົນກໍາໄລເທົ່າທຽມກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສິບປີ
meaning list.sentence: He spent a decade working in the fashion industry.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຮັດວຽກໃນອຸດສາຫະກໍາຄົນອັບເດດ: ສໍາລັບສິບປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະດັບ
meaning list.sentence: They decorated the house for the party.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ຕົກແຕ່ງເຮືອນສໍາລັບການພັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ເລິກ
meaning list.sentence: He breathed deep before diving into the water.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຫາຍໃຈເລິກໆກ່ອນທີ່ຈະດຳລົງໄປໃນນ້ຳ.

meaning list.meaning: ນິຍາມ
meaning list.sentence: It’s important to define your goals clearly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເປັນສິ່ງສໍາຄັນທີ່ຈະກໍານົດເປົ້າຫມາຍຂອງທ່ານຢ່າງຊັດເຈນ.

meaning list.meaning: ນິຍາມ, ສະເພາະ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: We need a definite answer by tomorrow.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕ້ອງການຄຳຕອບທີ່ແນ່ນອນໃນມື້ອື່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຳອະທິບາຍ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The dictionary provides a clear definition of the term.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວັດຈະນານຸກົມໃຫ້ຄໍານິຍາມທີ່ຊັດເຈນຂອງຄໍາສັບ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົ່ງ
meaning list.sentence: The courier will deliver the package tomorrow.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຈັດສົ່ງຈະຈັດສົ່ງຊຸດມື້ອື່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຮັດຕາມຄຳສັນຍາ
meaning list.sentence: She promised to help and delivered on her word.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ສັນຍາ​ວ່າ​ຈະ​ຊ່ວຍ​ເຫຼືອ ແລະ​ລາວ​ໄດ້​ຮັກສາ​ຄຳ​ສັນຍາ​ຂອງ​ລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ອອກເດີນທາງ, ອອກເດີນທາງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The departure of the flight is scheduled for 8 PM.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການອອກເດີນທາງຂອງຖ້ຽວບິນແມ່ນກໍານົດເວລາ 20:00 ໂມງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຖິງແມ່ນວ່າ (preposition)
meaning list.sentence: He finished the race despite the injury.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຖິງວ່າຈະມີການບາດເຈັບ, ລາວຈົບການແຂ່ງຂັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປາຍທາງ, ປາຍທາງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Their destination was a beautiful island in the Pacific.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຈຸດຫມາຍປາຍທາງຂອງພວກເຂົາແມ່ນເກາະທີ່ສວຍງາມໃນປາຊີຟິກ.

meaning list.meaning: ກໍານົດ, ກໍານົດ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The investigation will determine the cause of the fire.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສືບສວນຈະກໍານົດສາເຫດຂອງໄຟໄຫມ້.

meaning list.meaning: ກຳນົດ, ກຳນົດ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She is determined to succeed in her career.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມຕັ້ງໃຈທີ່ຈະປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດໃນການເຮັດວຽກຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ການພັດທະນາ, ການພັດທະນາ
meaning list.sentence: The development of technology has changed our lives.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການພັດທະນາຂອງເຕັກໂນໂລຢີໄດ້ປ່ຽນແປງຊີວິດຂອງພວກເຮົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຜນວາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The diagram shows the structure of the machine.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແຜນວາດສະແດງໃຫ້ເຫັນໂຄງສ້າງຂອງເຄື່ອງຈັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພັດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She wore a beautiful diamond necklace.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງໃສ່ສາຍຄໍເພັດທີ່ສວຍງາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຫຍຸ້ງຍາກ, ຄວາມຫຍຸ້ງຍາກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He faced great difficulty in solving the problem.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວພົບຄວາມຫຍຸ້ງຍາກອັນໃຫຍ່ຫຼວງໃນການແກ້ໄຂບັນຫາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊີ້​ນຳ, ຄຸ້ມ​ຄອງ (ຄຳ​ກຳ​ເນີດ)
meaning list.sentence: The teacher directed the students to the right classroom.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູສອນໃຫ້ນັກຮຽນເຂົ້າຫ້ອງທີ່ຖືກຕ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ກົງ (ຄຳສຸພາສິດ)
meaning list.sentence: You can contact me direct if you have any questions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຖ້າທ່ານມີຄໍາຖາມ, ທ່ານສາມາດຕິດຕໍ່ຂ້ອຍໂດຍກົງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດຍກົງ, ທັນທີ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The sun was shining directly into my eyes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແສງຕາເວັນໄດ້ສ່ອງແສງໂດຍກົງເຂົ້າໄປໃນຕາຂອງຂ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຝຸ່ນ, ດິນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There was dirt on his shoes after the hike.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຝຸ່ນໃສ່ເກີບຂອງລາວຫຼັງຈາກຍ່າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂໍ້ເສຍ, ຄວາມບໍ່ສະດວກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The lack of experience is a major disadvantage.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຂາດປະສົບການແມ່ນຂໍ້ເສຍປຽບອັນໃຫຍ່ຫຼວງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜິດຫວັງ
meaning list.sentence: She was disappointed with the exam results.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮູ້ສຶກຜິດຫວັງກັບຜົນການສອບເສັງຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜິດຫວັງ
meaning list.sentence: The ending of the movie was disappointing.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສິ້ນສຸດຂອງຮູບເງົາແມ່ນຫນ້າຜິດຫວັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສ່ວນຫຼຸດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The store is offering a 20% discount on all items.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທາງຮ້ານມີສ່ວນຫຼຸດ 20% ທຸກສິນຄ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ມັກ
meaning list.sentence: I dislike crowded places.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍບໍ່ມັກສະຖານທີ່ແອອັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ມັກ, ບໍ່ມັກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her dislike for spicy food is well known.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມບໍ່ມັກຂອງລາວສໍາລັບອາຫານເຜັດແມ່ນເປັນທີ່ຮູ້ຈັກດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຍກ, ແຍກ
meaning list.sentence: The teacher divided the class into groups.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູໄດ້ແບ່ງຫ້ອງຮຽນເປັນກຸ່ມ.

meaning list.meaning: ສາລະຄະດີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: We watched a fascinating documentary about wildlife.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາໄດ້ເບິ່ງສາລະຄະດີທີ່ໜ້າສົນໃຈກ່ຽວກັບສັດປ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍລິຈາກ
meaning list.sentence: She decided to donate her old clothes to charity.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕັດສິນໃຈບໍລິຈາກເຄື່ອງນຸ່ງເກົ່າຂອງລາວໃຫ້ກັບການກຸສົນ.

meaning list.sentence: The price of the tickets has doubled since last year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາຄາປີ້ໄດ້ເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນສອງເທົ່ານັບຕັ້ງແຕ່ປີທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົງໄສ
meaning list.sentence: There is no doubt about his honesty.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍ່ມີຄວາມສົງໃສກ່ຽວກັບຄວາມຊື່ສັດຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົງໄສ
meaning list.sentence: I doubt he will finish the project on time.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍບໍ່ຄິດວ່າລາວຈະສໍາເລັດໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຕ່ງຕົວ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She was elegantly dressed for the party.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງໄດ້ແຕ່ງຕົວຢ່າງສະຫງ່າງາມສໍາລັບງານລ້ຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ວາງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: A drop of water fell from the ceiling.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນ້ຳ​ໜຶ່ງ​ຕົກ​ຈາກ​ເພດານ.

meaning list.meaning: Drum (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He plays the drum in a local band.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຫຼີ້ນ drums ໃນແຖບທ້ອງຖິ່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເມົາເຫຼົ້າ
meaning list.sentence: He was too drunk to drive home safely.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ເມົາ​ເຫຼົ້າ​ເກີນ​ໄປ​ທີ່​ຈະ​ຂັບ​ລົດ​ກັບ​ບ້ານ​ຢ່າງ​ປອດ​ໄພ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄາດ​ວ່າ​ຈະ​ເນື່ອງ​ຈາກ (adjective​)
meaning list.sentence: The payment is due next week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຈ່າຍເງິນແມ່ນກໍານົດໃນອາທິດຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ເນື່ອງ​ຈາກ (adjective - ໃຫ້​ເຫດ​ຜົນ​)
meaning list.sentence: The delay was due to heavy traffic.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຊັກຊ້າແມ່ນເກີດມາຈາກການສັນຈອນຢ່າງຮຸນແຮງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂີ້ຝຸ່ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The furniture was covered in a thick layer of dust.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຟີນິເຈີໄດ້ຖືກປົກຄຸມດ້ວຍຊັ້ນຂີ້ຝຸ່ນຫນາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂີ້ຝຸ່ນ
meaning list.sentence: She dusted the shelves before placing the books.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງໄດ້ຂີ້ຝຸ່ນຊັ້ນວາງກ່ອນທີ່ຈະເອົາປຶ້ມອອກໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ວຽກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: It is the duty of a teacher to guide their students.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວຽກງານຂອງຄູສອນແມ່ນນໍາພານັກຮຽນຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ພາສີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: You have to pay customs duty on imported goods.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງຈ່າຍຄ່າພາສີສໍາລັບສິນຄ້ານໍາເຂົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຜ່ນດິນໄຫວ
meaning list.sentence: The earthquake caused widespread damage in the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແຜ່ນ​ດິນ​ໄຫວ​ໄດ້​ສ້າງ​ຄວາມ​ເສຍ​ຫາຍ​ຢ່າງ​ກວ້າງ​ຂວາງ​ໃນ​ເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕາເວັນອອກ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The eastern part of the country is mountainous.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພາກຕາເວັນອອກຂອງປະເທດແມ່ນພູດອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ເສດຖະກິດ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The government announced new economic policies.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານປະກາດນະໂຍບາຍເສດຖະກິດໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ເສດຖະກິດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The economy of the country is growing rapidly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເສດຖະກິດຂອງປະເທດກໍາລັງເຕີບໂຕຢ່າງໄວວາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເງິນຝາກປະຢັດ
meaning list.sentence: Economy of resources is crucial during a crisis.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປະຢັດຊັບພະຍາກອນແມ່ນສໍາຄັນໃນໄລຍະວິກິດການ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂອບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He stood at the edge of the cliff.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຢຸດ​ຢູ່​ແຄມ​ໜ້າ​ຜາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊ້າໆ
meaning list.sentence: She edged closer to the window to see better.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຄ່ອຍໆເຂົ້າໄປຫາປ່ອງຢ້ຽມເພື່ອໃຫ້ໄດ້ເບິ່ງດີຂຶ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ບັນນາທິການ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The editor revised the article before publishing it.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບັນນາທິການໄດ້ທົບທວນບົດຄວາມກ່ອນການພິມເຜີຍແຜ່.

meaning list.meaning: ສຶກສາ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The school aims to educate students in both academics and life skills.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງຮຽນ​ມີ​ຈຸດ​ປະ​ສົງ​ເພື່ອ​ໃຫ້​ນັກ​ສຶກສາ​ທັງ​ດ້ານ​ວິຊາ​ການ ​ແລະ ທັກ​ສະ​ຊີວິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການສຶກສາ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She is one of the most educated people in the community.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວແມ່ນຫນຶ່ງໃນຜູ້ທີ່ມີການສຶກສາຫຼາຍທີ່ສຸດໃນຊຸມຊົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການສຶກສາ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The museum provides many educational programs for children.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫໍພິພິທະພັນໄດ້ສະຫນອງໂຄງການການສຶກສາຈໍານວນຫຼາຍສໍາລັບເດັກນ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ມີປະສິດທິພາບ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This new strategy is highly effective in increasing sales.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຍຸດທະສາດໃຫມ່ນີ້ມີປະສິດທິພາບຫຼາຍໃນການເພີ່ມຍອດຂາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະສິດທິຜົນ
meaning list.sentence: The teacher communicated the lesson effectively to the students.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູອະທິບາຍບົດຮຽນໃຫ້ນັກຮຽນຢ່າງມີປະສິດທິພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມພະຍາຍາມ
meaning list.sentence: His effort to finish the project on time was remarkable.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມ​ພະ​ຍາ​ຍາມ​ເພື່ອ​ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ໂຄງ​ການ​ສໍາ​ເລັດ​ຕາມ​ເວ​ລາ​ແມ່ນ​ຫນ້າ​ສັງ​ເກດ.

meaning list.meaning: ທາງເລືອກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The presidential election will take place next month.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການເລືອກຕັ້ງປະທານາທິບໍດີຈະຈັດຂຶ້ນໃນເດືອນຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ອົງປະກອບ, ອົງປະກອບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Trust is an essential element of any relationship.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມໄວ້ວາງໃຈແມ່ນອົງປະກອບພື້ນຖານຂອງທຸກໆຄວາມສໍາພັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ອາຍ
meaning list.sentence: She felt embarrassed when everyone looked at her.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມອັບອາຍເມື່ອທຸກຄົນເບິ່ງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ໜ້າອາຍ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Forgetting his speech was an embarrassing moment for him.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເປັນເວລາທີ່ຫນ້າອັບອາຍສໍາລັບລາວທີ່ຈະລືມຄໍາເວົ້າຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຸກເສີນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: In case of an emergency, call 911 immediately.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນກໍລະນີສຸກເສີນ, ໃຫ້ໂທຫາ 911 ທັນທີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຮູ້ສຶກ
meaning list.sentence: Her voice was filled with emotion as she spoke.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສຽງຂອງລາວເຕັມໄປດ້ວຍຄວາມຮູ້ສຶກໃນຂະນະທີ່ລາວເວົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຈ້າງງານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company provides employment to thousands of people.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດມີພະນັກງານຫຼາຍພັນຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫວ່າງເປົ່າ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: He emptied the trash bin into the larger container.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຖິ້ມຖັງຂີ້ເຫຍື້ອເຂົ້າໄປໃນຖັງຂະຫນາດໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຊຸກຍູ້
meaning list.sentence: Teachers should encourage students to ask questions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູຄວນຊຸກຍູ້ໃຫ້ນັກຮຽນຖາມຄໍາຖາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັດຕູ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The two countries have been enemies for decades.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສອງ​ປະ​ເທດ​ເປັນ​ສັດຕູ​ກັນ​ມາ​ເປັນ​ເວລາ​ຫຼາຍ​ທົດ​ສະ​ວັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ມີສ່ວນຮ່ວມ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They got engaged last summer.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ມີ​ການ​ພົວ​ພັນ​ໃນ​ລະ​ດູ​ຮ້ອນ​ທີ່​ຜ່ານ​ມາ​.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ຫວ່າງ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The line was engaged when I tried to call.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເມື່ອຂ້ອຍພະຍາຍາມໂທຫາສາຍແມ່ນຫວ່າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ວິສະວະກໍາ
meaning list.sentence: He studied mechanical engineering at university.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮຽນວິສະວະກໍາກົນຈັກຢູ່ມະຫາວິທະຍາໄລ.

meaning list.meaning: ບັນເທີງ
meaning list.sentence: The magician entertained the children with his tricks.
meaning list.sentence translation: magician ບັນເທີງເດັກນ້ອຍທີ່ມີ tricks ລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ບັນເທີງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The hotel offers a wide range of entertainment options.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງແຮມມີທາງເລືອກການບັນເທີງທີ່ຫຼາກຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The main entrance of the building is on the left.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທາງເຂົ້າຫຼັກຂອງອາຄານແມ່ນຢູ່ເບື້ອງຊ້າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: No entry is allowed without a ticket.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍ່ອະນຸຍາດໃຫ້ເຂົ້າໂດຍບໍ່ມີປີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ການມີສ່ວນຮ່ວມ
meaning list.sentence: Her entry for the competition must be submitted by Friday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ເຂົ້າ​ຮ່ວມ​ການ​ແຂ່ງ​ຂັນ​ຕ້ອງ​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ໃນ​ວັນ​ສຸກ​.

meaning list.meaning: ສິ່ງແວດລ້ອມ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: We need to address the environmental issues affecting our planet.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຕ້ອງແກ້ໄຂບັນຫາສິ່ງແວດລ້ອມທີ່ມີຜົນກະທົບຕໍ່ໂລກຂອງພວກເຮົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ພະແນກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: I can't wait to watch the next episode of the series.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍບໍ່ສາມາດລໍຖ້າເບິ່ງຕອນຕໍ່ໄປຂອງຊຸດໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ສະເໝີພາບ
meaning list.sentence: All citizens should have equal rights.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພົນລະເມືອງທຸກຄົນຄວນມີສິດເທົ່າທຽມກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະເໝີພາບ
meaning list.sentence: Two plus two equals four.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສອງບວກສອງເທົ່າກັບສີ່.

meaning list.meaning: ເທົ່າກັນ
meaning list.sentence: The prize money was equally divided among the winners.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເງິນລາງວັນໄດ້ຖືກແບ່ງອອກເທົ່າທຽມກັນໃນບັນດາຜູ້ຊະນະ.

meaning list.meaning: ແລ່ນຫນີ
meaning list.sentence: The prisoners tried to escape from the jail.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກໂທດພະຍາຍາມຫລົບຫນີຈາກຄຸກ.

meaning list.meaning: ໜີ
meaning list.sentence: The escape of the convict was reported in the news.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຫລົບຫນີຂອງນັກໂທດໄດ້ຖືກລາຍງານຢູ່ໃນຂ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈຳເປັນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Water is essential for all forms of life.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນ້ໍາເປັນສິ່ງຈໍາເປັນສໍາລັບທຸກຮູບແບບຊີວິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຸດ​ທ້າຍ (adverb​)
meaning list.sentence: He eventually found the missing keys.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນ​ທີ່​ສຸດ ລາວ​ກໍ​ພົບ​ກະແຈ​ທີ່​ເສຍ​ໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ກວດ​ສອບ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The detective examined the evidence carefully.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກສືບໄດ້ກວດກາຫຼັກຖານຢ່າງລະມັດລະວັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍົກເວັ້ນ (ການເຊື່ອມຕໍ່)
meaning list.sentence: Everyone was invited to the party except John.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທຸກຄົນຖືກເຊີນເຂົ້າຮ່ວມງານລ້ຽງຍົກເວັ້ນ John.

meaning list.meaning: ປ່ຽນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There was a lively exchange of ideas during the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນ​ກອງ​ປະ​ຊຸມ​ໄດ້​ມີ​ການ​ແລກ​ປ່ຽນ​ຄວາມ​ຄິດ​ເຫັນ​ຢ່າງ​ມີ​ຊີ​ວິດ​.

meaning list.meaning: ແລກປ່ຽນ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: They exchanged gifts during the ceremony.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ແລກປ່ຽນ​ຂອງ​ຂວັນ​ໃນ​ພິທີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຕື່ນເຕັ້ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The children couldn't hide their excitement about the trip.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍບໍ່ສາມາດເຊື່ອງຄວາມຕື່ນເຕັ້ນຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າກ່ຽວກັບການເດີນທາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ງານວາງສະແດງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The art exhibition attracted many visitors.
meaning list.sentence translation: ງານ​ວາງສະ​ແດງ​ສິລະ​ປະ​ໄດ້​ດຶງ​ດູດ​ນັກ​ທ່ອງ​ທ່ຽວ​ເປັນ​ຈຳນວນ​ຫຼວງ​ຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂະຫຍາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The company plans to expand its operations internationally.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດວາງແຜນທີ່ຈະຂະຫຍາຍການດໍາເນີນງານຂອງຕົນໄປຕ່າງປະເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄາດ​ຄະ​ເນ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The expected results will be announced tomorrow.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜົນທີ່ຄາດໄວ້ຈະຖືກປະກາດໃນມື້ອື່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: Expedition (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The team is preparing for an expedition to the Arctic.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທີມງານກໍາລັງກະກຽມສໍາລັບການເດີນທາງໄປສູ່ຂົ້ວໂລກເຫນືອ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະສົບການ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: She experienced a new culture during her travels.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນລະຫວ່າງການເດີນທາງຂອງລາວ, ລາວມີປະສົບການວັດທະນະທໍາໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ມີປະສົບການ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: An experienced pilot is leading the team.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກບິນທີ່ມີປະສົບການນໍາພາທີມງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ທົດລອງ
meaning list.sentence: Scientists are experimenting with new treatments for the disease.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກວິທະຍາສາດກໍາລັງທົດລອງການປິ່ນປົວໃຫມ່ສໍາລັບພະຍາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະເບີດ
meaning list.sentence: The bomb exploded in the middle of the square.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລະ​ເບີດ​ໄດ້​ແຕກ​ຂຶ້ນ​ຢູ່​ກາງ​ສະໜາມ​ຫຼວງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄົ້ນພົບ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: They set out to explore the uncharted island.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ອອກເດີນທາງໄປສໍາຫຼວດເກາະ uncharted ໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ການລະເບີດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The explosion caused significant damage to the building.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ເຫດ​ລະ​ເບີດ​ໄດ້​ສ້າງ​ຄວາມ​ເສຍ​ຫາຍ​ຢ່າງ​ຫຼວງ​ຫຼາຍ​ໃຫ້​ແກ່​ຕຶກ​ອາຄານ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົ່ງອອກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The country's main export is oil.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສົ່ງອອກຕົ້ນຕໍຂອງປະເທດແມ່ນນ້ໍາມັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂັບໄລ່
meaning list.sentence: The company exports its products to over 50 countries.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ສົ່ງອອກຜະລິດຕະພັນຂອງຕົນໄປຫຼາຍກ່ວາ 50 ປະເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ພິເສດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: You need to pay extra for faster shipping.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງຈ່າຍຄ່າທໍານຽມເພີ່ມເຕີມສໍາລັບການຂົນສົ່ງທີ່ໄວຂຶ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ພິເສດ
meaning list.sentence: She worked extra to finish the project on time.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ເຮັດ​ວຽກ​ໜັກ​ເປັນ​ພິ​ເສດ​ເພື່ອ​ສຳ​ເລັດ​ໂຄງ​ການ​ໃຫ້​ທັນ​ເວ​ລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະເຊີນຫນ້າ
meaning list.sentence: The company faces new challenges in the market.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດກໍາລັງປະເຊີນກັບສິ່ງທ້າທາຍໃຫມ່ໃນຕະຫຼາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂ້ອນຂ້າງ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The test was fairly easy compared to the last one.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການທົດສອບແມ່ນຂ້ອນຂ້າງງ່າຍເມື່ອທຽບກັບການທົດສອບທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍຸດຕິທຳ
meaning list.sentence: The work was distributed fairly among the team members.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວຽກງານໄດ້ຖືກແຈກຢາຍຢ່າງຍຸດຕິທໍາລະຫວ່າງສະມາຊິກໃນທີມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຸ້ນເຄີຍ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This street looks familiar to me.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຖະໜົນນີ້ເບິ່ງຄືວ່າຂ້ອຍຄຸ້ນເຄີຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ປາດຖະໜາ
meaning list.sentence: Do you fancy a cup of tea?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຢາກດື່ມຊາບໍ?

meaning list.meaning: ແຟນຊີ
meaning list.sentence: She wore a fancy dress to the party.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງໃສ່ຊຸດແຟຊັນໄປງານລ້ຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫ່າງ​ໄກ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The village is far from the nearest city.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫມູ່ບ້ານຢູ່ໄກຈາກເມືອງທີ່ໃກ້ທີ່ສຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໜ້າສົນໃຈ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The documentary was absolutely fascinating.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສາລະຄະດີແມ່ນໜ້າສົນໃຈແທ້ໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄົນອັບເດດ:
meaning list.sentence: It's fashionable to wear vintage clothes these days.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນ ເປັນ trendy ທີ່ ຈະ ໃສ່ ເຄື່ອງ ນຸ່ງ vintage ໃນ ມື້ ນີ້ .

meaning list.meaning: ຜູກມັດ
meaning list.sentence: Please fasten your seatbelt before takeoff.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາຮັດສາຍແອວຂອງທ່ານກ່ອນທີ່ຈະຂຶ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເມດຕາ
meaning list.sentence: Can you do me a favour and pick up my package?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າສາມາດໃຫ້ຂ້ອຍພໍໃຈແລະເອົາຊຸດຂອງຂ້ອຍໄດ້ບໍ?

meaning list.meaning: ຢ້ານ
meaning list.sentence: She fears flying in airplanes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຢ້ານການບິນ.

meaning list.meaning: to feature, to feature (ພະຍັນຊະນະ)
meaning list.sentence: The movie features stunning visual effects.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບເງົາປະກອບດ້ວຍຜົນກະທົບທາງສາຍຕາທີ່ຫນ້າຕື່ນຕາຕື່ນໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮົ້ວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The garden is surrounded by a wooden fence.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສວນແມ່ນອ້ອມຮອບດ້ວຍຮົ້ວໄມ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຕໍ່ສູ້, ຂັດແຍ້ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There has been heavy fighting in the region.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີ​ການ​ປະ​ທະ​ກັນ​ຢ່າງ​ຮຸນ​ແຮງ​ຢູ່​ໃນ​ພາກ​ພື້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄຟລ໌ (ຊື່)
meaning list.sentence: I saved the document in a new file.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍບັນທຶກເອກະສານໃສ່ໄຟລ໌ໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ການເງິນ, ການເງິນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company is facing serious financial difficulties.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດປະເຊີນກັບຄວາມຫຍຸ້ງຍາກທາງດ້ານການເງິນທີ່ຮ້າຍແຮງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຟິດເນສ, ຄວາມແຂງແຮງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She goes to the gym to improve her fitness.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄປ gym ເພື່ອປັບປຸງການອອກກໍາລັງກາຍຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄົງ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The company has a fixed schedule for meetings.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດມີກໍານົດເວລາທີ່ກໍານົດໄວ້ສໍາລັບການປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ທຸງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The national flag was raised during the ceremony.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທຸງ​ຊາດ​ຖືກ​ຍົກ​ຂຶ້ນ​ໃນ​ລະ​ຫວ່າງ​ພິ​ທີ.

meaning list.meaning: ນໍ້າຖ້ວມ
meaning list.sentence: The flood caused significant damage to the area.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໄພ​ນ້ຳ​ຖ້ວມ​ໄດ້​ສ້າງ​ຄວາມ​ເສຍ​ຫາຍ​ຢ່າງ​ໜັກ​ໜ່ວງ​ໃນ​ເຂດ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: ນໍ້າຖ້ວມ
meaning list.sentence: Heavy rains flooded the streets of the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຝົນຕົກໜັກໄດ້ຖ້ວມຖະໜົນຫົນທາງໃນເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ແປ້ງ
meaning list.sentence: You need two cups of flour for this recipe.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສູດນີ້ຕ້ອງການແປ້ງສອງຈອກ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄຫຼ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The river flows into the ocean.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແມ່ນ້ໍາໄຫລເຂົ້າໄປໃນມະຫາສະຫມຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະແສ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The flow of traffic was disrupted by the accident.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອຸບັດຕິເຫດເຮັດໃຫ້ການສັນຈອນຕິດຂັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ພັບ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She folded the paper in half before handing it to him.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ພັບ​ເຈ້ຍ​ລົງ​ເຄິ່ງ​ໜຶ່ງ ແລະ​ຍື່ນ​ໃຫ້​ນາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄົນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Folk music is popular in rural areas.
meaning list.sentence translation: ດົນ​ຕີ​ພື້ນ​ເມືອງ​ເປັນ​ທີ່​ນິ​ຍົມ​ໃນ​ເຂດ​ຊົນ​ນະ​ບົດ​.

meaning list.meaning: ສາທາລະນະ
meaning list.sentence: They performed traditional folk dances at the festival.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ສະ​ແດງ​ການ​ຟ້ອນ​ພື້ນ​ເມືອງ​ໃນ​ງານ​ບຸນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕໍ່ໄປນີ້, ຕໍ່ໄປ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The following day, the weather improved.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມື້ຕໍ່ມາ, ສະພາບອາກາດດີຂຶ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ອຳນາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The force of the wind was incredible during the storm.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມ​ແຮງ​ຂອງ​ລົມ​ໃນ​ລະ​ຫວ່າງ​ພະ​ຍຸ​ແມ່ນ​ບໍ່​ຫນ້າ​ເຊື່ອ.

meaning list.meaning: ບັງຄັບ
meaning list.sentence: He forced the door open when he lost his keys.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເມື່ອລາວສູນເສຍກະແຈຂອງລາວ, ລາວບັງຄັບໃຫ້ປະຕູເປີດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕະຫຼອດໄປ
meaning list.sentence: She promised to love him forever.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສັນຍາວ່າຈະຮັກນາງຕະຫຼອດໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ກອບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She put the photo in a silver frame.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເອົາຮູບໃສ່ໃນກອບເງິນ.

meaning list.meaning: ກອບ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: They framed the painting to preserve it.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ກອບຮູບແຕ້ມເພື່ອປົກປ້ອງມັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຊ່ແຂງ
meaning list.sentence: Water freezes at 0 degrees Celsius.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນ້ໍາ freezes ທີ່ 0 ອົງສາເຊນຊຽດ.

meaning list.meaning: ມັກ
meaning list.sentence: She frequently travels abroad for work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມັກຈະເດີນທາງໄປຕ່າງປະເທດເພື່ອທຸລະກິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ມິດຕະພາບ
meaning list.sentence: Their friendship has lasted for many years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມິດຕະພາບ​ຂອງ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ດຳ​ເນີນ​ໄປ​ເປັນ​ເວລາ​ຫລາຍ​ປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ້ານ
meaning list.sentence: The loud noise frightened the children.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສຽງດັງດັງເຮັດໃຫ້ເດັກນ້ອຍຢ້ານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ້ານ
meaning list.sentence: She felt frightened during the thunderstorm.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮູ້ສຶກຢ້ານໃນລະຫວ່າງພາຍຸ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ້ານ
meaning list.sentence: It was a frightening experience for everyone involved.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນີ້ແມ່ນປະສົບການທີ່ຫນ້າຢ້ານກົວສໍາລັບທຸກຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຊ່ແຂງ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The lake was completely frozen over.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະເລສາບໄດ້ຖືກແຊ່ແຂງຢ່າງສົມບູນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈືນ
meaning list.sentence: She fried the potatoes in hot oil.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຂົ້ວມັນຕົ້ນໃນນ້ໍາມັນຮ້ອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ນໍ້າມັນເຊື້ອໄຟ
meaning list.sentence: The car runs on diesel fuel.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດແລ່ນດ້ວຍນໍ້າມັນກາຊວນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໜ້າທີ່ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The primary function of the device is to measure temperature.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫນ້າທີ່ຕົ້ນຕໍຂອງອຸປະກອນແມ່ນການວັດແທກອຸນຫະພູມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂົນ
meaning list.sentence: The cat's fur is soft and fluffy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂົນຂອງແມວແມ່ນອ່ອນແລະ fluffy.

meaning list.meaning: ເພີ່ມເຕີມ
meaning list.sentence: We need to discuss this matter further.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງປຶກສາຫາລືກ່ຽວກັບບັນຫານີ້ຕື່ມອີກ.

meaning list.meaning: garage (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The car is parked in the garage.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດແມ່ນຈອດຢູ່ໃນ garage ໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ເຕົ້າໂຮມ, ມາເຕົ້າໂຮມກັນ
meaning list.sentence: The students gathered in the auditorium for the lecture.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກຮຽນໄດ້ເຕົ້າໂຮມກັນຢູ່ໃນຫ້ອງປະຊຸມເພື່ອຖອດຖອນບົດຮຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປົກ​ກະ​ຕິ (adverb​)
meaning list.sentence: She is generally punctual for meetings.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປົກກະຕິແລ້ວລາວມາປະຊຸມຕາມເວລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ລຸ້ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This is a tradition passed down through generations.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນີ້​ແມ່ນ​ປະ​ເພນີ​ທີ່​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ການ​ສືບ​ທອດ​ມາ​ແຕ່​ລຸ້ນຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຈກວ້າງ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She is known for her generous donations to charity.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນທີ່ຮູ້ຈັກສໍາລັບການບໍລິຈາກອັນເອື້ອເຟື້ອເພື່ອການກຸສົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ອ່ອນໂຍນ
meaning list.sentence: He has a gentle approach when dealing with children.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີວິທີການທີ່ອ່ອນໂຍນເມື່ອພົວພັນກັບເດັກນ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຸພາບບຸລຸດ, ສຸພາບສະຕີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: A true gentleman always shows respect to others.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເປັນສຸພາບບຸລຸດທີ່ແທ້ຈິງສະເຫມີສະແດງຄວາມເຄົາລົບຕໍ່ຜູ້ອື່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They claim to have seen a ghost in the old house.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າອ້າງວ່າໄດ້ເຫັນຜີຢູ່ໃນເຮືອນເກົ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍັກ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The statue is a giant work of art.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບປັ້ນແມ່ນວຽກງານສິລະປະອັນໃຫຍ່ຫຼວງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍັກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The story features a giant who guards a treasure.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ໃນ​ເລື່ອງ, ມີ​ຍັກ​ໃຫຍ່​ຮັກສາ​ຊັບ​ສົມບັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ພໍໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: I'm so glad you could make it to the party.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍດີໃຈຫຼາຍທີ່ເຈົ້າສາມາດເຂົ້າຮ່ວມງານລ້ຽງໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ທົ່ວໂລກ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Global warming is a serious threat to our planet.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂລກຮ້ອນເປັນໄພຂົ່ມຂູ່ທີ່ຮ້າຍແຮງຕໍ່ໂລກຂອງພວກເຮົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖົງມື
meaning list.sentence: He wore gloves to protect his hands from the cold.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໃສ່ຖົງມືເພື່ອປ້ອງກັນມືຂອງລາວຈາກຄວາມເຢັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການທົດລອງ, ພະຍາຍາມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Let me have a go at solving this puzzle.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃຫ້ຂ້ອຍພະຍາຍາມແກ້ໄຂປິດສະໜານີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ສິນຄ້າ
meaning list.sentence: The shop sells a variety of goods including clothes and electronics.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮ້ານຂາຍສິນຄ້າຫຼາກຫຼາຍປະເພດ ລວມທັງເສື້ອຜ້າ ແລະ ເຄື່ອງເອເລັກໂທຣນິກ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະດັບ, ລະດັບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She received a high grade on her final exam.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບຄະແນນສູງໃນການສອບເສັງຄັ້ງສຸດທ້າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈົບການສຶກສາ
meaning list.sentence: She is a graduate of Harvard University.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວແມ່ນຈົບການສຶກສາຈາກມະຫາວິທະຍາໄລ Harvard.

meaning list.meaning: ຈົບການສຶກສາ
meaning list.sentence: He graduated with honors from medical school.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຈົບຈາກໂຮງຮຽນການແພດດ້ວຍກຽດນິຍົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ເມັດພືດ
meaning list.sentence: The region is known for its production of grain.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພາກພື້ນແມ່ນເປັນທີ່ຮູ້ຈັກສໍາລັບການຜະລິດເມັດພືດຂອງຕົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮູ້ບຸນຄຸນ
meaning list.sentence: I am grateful for your help with the project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້າພະເຈົ້າຂໍຂອບໃຈສໍາລັບການຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອຂອງທ່ານໃນໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຂະຫຍາຍຕົວ, ການພັດທະນາ
meaning list.sentence: The company reported significant growth in sales this year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ລາຍງານການຂະຫຍາຍຕົວຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍໃນການຂາຍໃນປີນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ການປົກປ້ອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The museum hired extra guards for the exhibition.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫໍພິພິທະພັນໄດ້ຈ້າງຄົນຍາມເພີ່ມເຕີມສໍາລັບງານວາງສະແດງ.

meaning list.meaning: ປົກປ້ອງ
meaning list.sentence: The soldiers were guarding the entrance to the base.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະຫານໄດ້ເຝົ້າຍາມທາງເຂົ້າຖານທັບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜິດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The jury found him guilty of the crime.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄະນະລູກຂຸນພົບວ່າລາວມີຄວາມຜິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຫ້, ຂະຫຍາຍ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She handed him the keys to the car.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເອົາກະແຈລົດໃຫ້ລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ວາງສາຍ
meaning list.sentence: They hung the picture on the wall.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າແຂວນຮູບໃສ່ຝາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມສຸກ
meaning list.sentence: Her smile is a reflection of her happiness.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮອຍຍິ້ມຂອງລາວເປັນການສະທ້ອນເຖິງຄວາມສຸກຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: hardly, hardly (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: I can hardly hear you over the noise.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້າ​ພະ​ເຈົ້າ​ບໍ່​ສາ​ມາດ​ໄດ້​ຍິນ​ທ່ານ​ໃນ​ໄລ​ຍະ​ສິ່ງ​ລົບ​ກວນ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຊັງ
meaning list.sentence: His hate for injustice was evident in his actions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມກຽດຊັງຄວາມບໍ່ຍຸຕິທໍາຂອງລາວແມ່ນເຫັນໄດ້ຊັດເຈນໃນການກະທໍາຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄປ, ໄປ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: We are heading to the park after lunch.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງຈາກອາຫານທ່ຽງພວກເຮົາໄປສວນສາທາລະນະ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫົວຂໍ້ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The headline of the newspaper caught everyone's attention.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫົວຂໍ້ຂ່າວຂອງຫນັງສືພິມໄດ້ດຶງດູດຄວາມສົນໃຈຂອງທຸກໆຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການໃຫ້ຄວາມຮ້ອນ
meaning list.sentence: The heating in the building is not working properly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການໃຫ້ຄວາມຮ້ອນໃນອາຄານເຮັດວຽກບໍ່ຖືກຕ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຸມ
meaning list.sentence: It was raining heavily all night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຝົນຕົກໜັກຕະຫຼອດຄືນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຮລິຄອບເຕີ
meaning list.sentence: The helicopter landed safely in the field.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຍົນເຮລິຄອບເຕີ້ໄດ້ລົງຈອດຢ່າງປອດໄພຢູ່ໃນສະໜາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ເນັ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: She highlighted the main points of the presentation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເນັ້ນໃສ່ຈຸດຕົ້ນຕໍຂອງການນໍາສະເຫນີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈຸດສຳຄັນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The highlight of the trip was visiting the Eiffel Tower.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຈຸດ​ເດັ່ນ​ຂອງ​ການ​ເດີນ​ທາງ​ແມ່ນ​ການ​ຢ້ຽມ​ຢາມ​ຫໍ Eiffel.

meaning list.meaning: ຂ້ອນຂ້າງ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: She is highly skilled in her field.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີພອນສະຫວັນຫຼາຍໃນພາກສະຫນາມຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະໝັກ
meaning list.sentence: The company plans to hire more employees next year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດວາງແຜນທີ່ຈະຈ້າງພະນັກງານເພີ່ມເຕີມໃນປີຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຫວັດສາດ (ສຳຄັນ) (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The treaty was a historic moment for both nations.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສົນທິສັນຍາ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ແມ່ນ​ຈຸດ​ເວລາ​ປະຫວັດສາດ​ຂອງ​ທັງ​ສອງ​ປະ​ເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຫວັດສາດ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This museum houses many historical artifacts.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫໍພິພິທະ​ພັນ​ແຫ່ງ​ນີ້​ມີ​ວັດຖຸ​ບູຮານ​ທາງ​ປະຫວັດສາດ​ຫຼາຍ​ຢ່າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊື່ສັດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He is known for being an honest and reliable person.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນທີ່ຮູ້ຈັກເປັນຄົນຊື່ສັດແລະເຊື່ອຖືໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຂີ້ຮ້າຍ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The movie was so horrible that I couldn't watch it until the end.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບເງົາດັ່ງກ່າວເປັນຕາຢ້ານຫຼາຍຈົນບໍ່ສາມາດເບິ່ງຈົນຈົບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຢ້ານກົວ
meaning list.sentence: He looked at the accident scene in horror.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ເບິ່ງ​ບ່ອນ​ເກີດ​ອຸບັດ​ເຫດ​ດ້ວຍ​ຄວາມ​ຢ້ານ​ກົວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຈົ້າພາບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The host welcomed the guests warmly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າພາບຕ້ອນຮັບແຂກຢ່າງອົບອຸ່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ລ່າສັດ
meaning list.sentence: The villagers went to the forest to hunt wild boar.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊາວບ້ານໄປປ່າລ່າສັດປ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຮີຣິເຄນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The hurricane caused massive destruction along the coast.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພາຍຸເຮີຣິເຄນໄດ້ເຮັດໃຫ້ເກີດຄວາມເສຍຫາຍຢ່າງໃຫຍ່ຫຼວງຢູ່ຕາມຊາຍຝັ່ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຟ້າວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There's no hurry; we have plenty of time.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາບໍ່ໄດ້ຢູ່ໃນ hurry; ພວກເຮົາມີເວລາຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮີບຮ້ອນ
meaning list.sentence: We need to hurry if we want to catch the train.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຕ້ອງຮີບຮ້ອນຖ້າພວກເຮົາຕ້ອງການຈັບລົດໄຟ.

meaning list.meaning: ID (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The police are trying to confirm the identity of the suspect.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຳຫຼວດກຳລັງພະຍາຍາມຢືນຢັນຕົວຕົນຂອງຜູ້ຕ້ອງສົງໄສ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ສົນໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: He chose to ignore the warning signs.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເລືອກທີ່ຈະບໍ່ສົນໃຈສັນຍານເຕືອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜິດກົດໝາຍ
meaning list.sentence: Selling counterfeit goods is illegal.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຂາຍຂອງປອມແມ່ນຜິດກົດຫມາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈິນຕະນາການ
