meaning list.sentence: The story is about an imaginary world filled with magical creatures.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເລື່ອງແມ່ນກ່ຽວກັບໂລກຈິນຕະນາການທີ່ເຕັມໄປດ້ວຍສັດ magical.

meaning list.meaning: ທັນ​ທີ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The patient requires immediate medical attention.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄົນເຈັບຕ້ອງການການດູແລທາງການແພດທັນທີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄົນເຂົ້າເມືອງ
meaning list.sentence: The country welcomed many immigrants seeking a better life.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະເທດໄດ້ຕ້ອນຮັບຜູ້ອົບພະຍົບຫຼາຍຄົນທີ່ຊອກຫາຊີວິດທີ່ດີກວ່າ

meaning list.meaning: ກະທົບ, ກະທົບ
meaning list.sentence: The new policy had a significant impact on the economy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນະ​ໂຍ​ບາຍ​ໃຫມ່​ໄດ້​ມີ​ຜົນ​ກະ​ທົບ​ທີ່​ສໍາ​ຄັນ​ຕໍ່​ເສດ​ຖະ​ກິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະທົບ, ກະທົບ
meaning list.sentence: The heavy rainfall impacted the construction schedule.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຝົນຕົກໜັກສົ່ງຜົນກະທົບຕໍ່ຕາຕະລາງການກໍ່ສ້າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ນຳເຂົ້າ
meaning list.sentence: The country's import of electronic goods has increased.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ນໍາ​ເຂົ້າ​ສິນ​ຄ້າ​ເອ​ເລັກ​ໂຕຣ​ນິກ​ຂອງ​ປະ​ເທດ​ເພີ່ມ​ຂຶ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ນໍາເຂົ້າ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: They import coffee beans from Brazil.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົານໍາເຂົ້າເມັດກາເຟຈາກປະເທດບຣາຊິນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມສຳຄັນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The teacher emphasized the importance of studying daily.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຈານເນັ້ນຄວາມສຳຄັນຂອງການຮຽນທຸກໆມື້.

meaning list.meaning: ປະທັບໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: He left a positive impression on everyone he met.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ປະຖິ້ມຄວາມປະທັບໃຈໃນແງ່ດີຕໍ່ທຸກໆຄົນທີ່ລາວໄດ້ພົບ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະທັບໃຈ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The performance was truly impressive.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສະແດງແມ່ນປະທັບໃຈແທ້ໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ການພັດທະນາ, ການຟື້ນຟູ
meaning list.sentence: The company showed significant improvement in its sales figures.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ສະແດງໃຫ້ເຫັນການປັບປຸງຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍໃນຕົວເລກການຂາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: incredibly (ຄໍາ​ສັບ​ຕ່າງໆ​)
meaning list.sentence: The book is incredibly interesting and hard to put down.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປື້ມແມ່ນຫນ້າສົນໃຈ incredibly ແລະຍາກທີ່ຈະເອົາລົງ.

meaning list.meaning: ແທ້ໆ
meaning list.sentence: He is indeed one of the best players in the league.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວແມ່ນແທ້ໆຫນຶ່ງໃນຜູ້ນທີ່ດີທີ່ສຸດໃນລີກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊີ້ບອກ, ສະແດງ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The results indicate a need for further research.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜົນໄດ້ຮັບຊີ້ໃຫ້ເຫັນວ່າຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງມີການຄົ້ນຄວ້າເພີ່ມເຕີມ.

meaning list.meaning: ທາງອ້ອມ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The message was conveyed in an indirect way.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂໍ້ຄວາມໄດ້ຖືກຖ່າຍທອດໂດຍທາງອ້ອມ.

meaning list.meaning: ພື້ນທີ່ປິດລ້ອມ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The children played indoor games during the storm.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກ​ນ້ອຍ​ໄດ້​ຫຼິ້ນ​ເກມ​ໃນ​ເຮືອນ​ໃນ​ໄລ​ຍະ​ພະ​ຍຸ​.

meaning list.meaning: ພາຍໃນເຮືອນ, ຢູ່ໃນພື້ນທີ່ປິດ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: We stayed indoors due to the heavy rain.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາພັກຢູ່ພາຍໃນເນື່ອງຈາກຝົນຕົກໜັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜົນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her speech had a strong influence on the audience.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄຳ​ປາ​ໄສ​ຂອງ​ເພິ່ນ​ໄດ້​ສ້າງ​ຄວາມ​ປະ​ທັບ​ໃຈ​ຢ່າງ​ແຮງ​ຕໍ່​ຜູ້​ຊົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ອິດທິພົນ
meaning list.sentence: Parents influence their children's behavior.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພໍ່ແມ່ມີອິດທິພົນຕໍ່ພຶດຕິກໍາຂອງລູກ.

meaning list.meaning: ວັດສະດຸ, ສ່ວນປະກອບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Flour and eggs are key ingredients for making pancakes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແປ້ງແລະໄຂ່ແມ່ນສ່ວນປະກອບພື້ນຖານສໍາລັບການເຮັດ pancakes.

meaning list.meaning: ບາດເຈັບ
meaning list.sentence: He injured his leg while playing soccer.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບບາດເຈັບຂາຂອງລາວໃນຂະນະທີ່ຫຼີ້ນບານເຕະ.

meaning list.meaning: ບາດເຈັບ
meaning list.sentence: The injured passengers were taken to the hospital.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້​ໂດຍ​ສານ​ບາດ​ເຈັບ​ໄດ້​ຖືກ​ນໍາ​ໄປ​ໂຮງ​ຫມໍ​.

meaning list.meaning: Innocent (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The court found her innocent of all charges.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສານ​ໄດ້​ເຫັນ​ວ່າ​ລາວ​ບໍ່​ມີ​ຄວາມ​ຜິດ​ໃນ​ທຸກ​ຂໍ້​ກ່າວ​ຫາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມສະຫຼາດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her intelligence and creativity impressed everyone.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະຕິປັນຍາແລະຄວາມຄິດສ້າງສັນຂອງລາວເຮັດໃຫ້ທຸກຄົນປະທັບໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕັ້ງໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: I intend to finish this project by next week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍວາງແຜນທີ່ຈະສໍາເລັດໂຄງການນີ້ໃນອາທິດຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຕັ້ງໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: His intention was to help, not to criticize.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຈຸດປະສົງຂອງລາວບໍ່ແມ່ນການວິພາກວິຈານ, ແຕ່ເພື່ອຊ່ວຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົງທຶນ
meaning list.sentence: They decided to invest in renewable energy projects.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າຕັດສິນໃຈລົງທຶນໃນໂຄງການພະລັງງານທົດແທນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສືບສວນ, ສືບສວນ
meaning list.sentence: The police are investigating the cause of the fire.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຳຫຼວດກຳລັງສືບສວນສາເຫດຂອງໄຟໄໝ້.

meaning list.meaning: ລວມທັງ, ກ່ຽວຂ້ອງກັບ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: He was involved in organizing the event.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີສ່ວນຮ່ວມໃນການຈັດງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ທາດເຫຼັກ
meaning list.sentence: The bridge is made of iron and steel.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂົວແມ່ນເຮັດດ້ວຍເຫຼັກແລະເຫຼັກກ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ລີດ
meaning list.sentence: She ironed her clothes before the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວລີດເຄື່ອງນຸ່ງຂອງລາວກ່ອນການປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ບັນຫາ, ຫົວຂໍ້ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The main issue is how to reduce costs.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບັນຫາຕົ້ນຕໍແມ່ນວິທີການຫຼຸດຜ່ອນຄ່າໃຊ້ຈ່າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຕັກໂນໂລຊີຂໍ້ມູນຂ່າວສານ
meaning list.sentence: She works in the IT department of a large company.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຮັດວຽກຢູ່ໃນພະແນກເຕັກໂນໂລຢີຂໍ້ມູນຂ່າວສານຂອງບໍລິສັດຂະຫນາດໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: Diary, ວາລະສານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She keeps a journal to document her travels.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເກັບບັນທຶກບັນທຶກການເດີນທາງຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ພິພາກສາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The judge announced the verdict after the trial.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ພິພາກສາປະກາດການຕັດສິນໃຈພາຍຫຼັງການໄຕ່ສວນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕັດສິນ
meaning list.sentence: Do not judge people based on their appearance.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຢ່າ​ຕັດ​ສິນ​ຄົນ​ດ້ວຍ​ຮູບ​ຮ່າງ​ຂອງ​ເຂົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະຕືລືລົ້ນ, ເຕັມໃຈ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: She is very keen to start her new job.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມກະຕືລືລົ້ນຫຼາຍທີ່ຈະເລີ່ມຕົ້ນວຽກໃຫມ່ຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອເຂົ້າລະຫັດ, ລັອກດ້ວຍກະແຈ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: Please key in your password to access the account.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາໃສ່ລະຫັດຜ່ານຂອງທ່ານເພື່ອເຂົ້າເຖິງບັນຊີ.

meaning list.meaning: ແປ້ນພິມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She bought a wireless keyboard for her computer.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຊື້ແປ້ນພິມໄຮ້ສາຍສໍາລັບຄອມພິວເຕີຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຕະ
meaning list.sentence: He kicked the ball into the goal.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຕະບານເຂົ້າໄປໃນເປົ້າຫມາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຕະ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The player received a red card for a dangerous kick.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ນໄດ້ຮັບບັດສີແດງສໍາລັບການເຕະອັນຕະລາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂ້າ, ຂ້າ
meaning list.sentence: The killing of innocent civilians was condemned globally.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ສັງຫານ​ພົນລະ​ເຮືອນ​ຜູ້​ບໍລິສຸດ​ໄດ້​ຖືກ​ປະນາມ​ໃນ​ທົ່ວ​ໂລກ.

meaning list.meaning: ອ່ອນໂຍນ
meaning list.sentence: She is always kind to animals.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມເມດຕາຕໍ່ສັດສະ ເໝີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈູບ
meaning list.sentence: He kissed his mother before leaving the house.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຈູບແມ່ຂອງລາວກ່ອນທີ່ຈະອອກຈາກເຮືອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈູບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She gave him a kiss on the cheek.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງໃຫ້ເຂົາຈູບແກ້ມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕີ, ຟັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: I heard a knock at the door late at night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕອນກາງຄືນຂ້ອຍໄດ້ຍິນສຽງເຄາະປະຕູ.

meaning list.meaning: ປ້າຍກຳກັບ
meaning list.sentence: The label on the bottle indicates the contents.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປ້າຍໃສ່ຂວດສະແດງໃຫ້ເຫັນເນື້ອໃນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປ້າຍກຳກັບ
meaning list.sentence: She labeled the boxes before moving them.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຕິດ​ປ້າຍ​ກ່ອງ​ຕ່າງໆ​ກ່ອນ​ທີ່​ຈະ​ຍ້າຍ​ອອກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫ້ອງທົດລອງ
meaning list.sentence: The experiments were conducted in a state-of-the-art laboratory.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການທົດລອງໄດ້ຖືກປະຕິບັດຢູ່ໃນຫ້ອງທົດລອງທີ່ທັນສະໄຫມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂາດ, ຂາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The project failed due to a lack of funding.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງການດັ່ງກ່າວລົ້ມເຫລວຍ້ອນຂາດທຶນຮອນພຽງພໍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂາດ
meaning list.sentence: He lacks the necessary skills for the job.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວບໍ່ມີທັກສະທີ່ຈໍາເປັນສໍາລັບວຽກ.

meaning list.meaning: ລ່າ​ສຸດ, ໃໝ່​ສຸດ (ຄຳ​ຄຸນ​ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This is the latest model of their car.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນີ້ແມ່ນຮູບແບບໃຫມ່ທີ່ສຸດຂອງລົດຂອງພວກເຂົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ວາງ, ວາງ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She laid the book on the table.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວວາງປື້ມໄວ້ເທິງໂຕະ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊັ້ນ, ຊັ້ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The cake has three layers of chocolate.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຄັກມີສາມຊັ້ນຂອງຊັອກໂກແລັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເປັນຜູ້ນໍາ, ຄວາມເປັນຜູ້ນໍາ
meaning list.sentence: She took the lead in organizing the event.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ເປັນ​ຜູ້​ນໍາ​ໃນ​ການ​ຈັດ​ຕັ້ງ​ການ​.

meaning list.meaning: ນໍາ, ນໍາ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: He is one of the leading experts in the field.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນຫນຶ່ງໃນຜູ້ຊ່ຽວຊານຊັ້ນນໍາໃນພາກສະຫນາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The trees lose their leaves in autumn.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕົ້ນໄມ້ຫຼົ່ນໃບໃນລະດູໃບໄມ້ປົ່ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໜັງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He bought a new leather jacket.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຊື້​ເສື້ອ​ໜັງ​ໃໝ່.

meaning list.meaning: ທາງດ້ານກົດໝາຍ
meaning list.sentence: Owning this type of weapon is not legal in many countries.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການເປັນເຈົ້າຂອງອາວຸດປະເພດນີ້ແມ່ນຜິດກົດຫມາຍຢູ່ໃນຫຼາຍປະເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ພັກຜ່ອນ, ພັກຜ່ອນ
meaning list.sentence: In his leisure time, he enjoys reading books.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມັກອ່ານປຶ້ມໃນເວລາຫວ່າງຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຍາວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The length of the table is two meters.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຍາວຂອງຕາຕະລາງແມ່ນສອງແມັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮາບພຽງ, ລະດັບ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Make sure the surface is level before building.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃຫ້ແນ່ໃຈວ່າພື້ນຜິວແມ່ນຮາບພຽງກ່ອນທີ່ຈະເລີ່ມການກໍ່ສ້າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເວົ້າຕົວະ
meaning list.sentence: He lied about his whereabouts last night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕົວະວ່າລາວຢູ່ໃສໃນຄືນທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົວະ
meaning list.sentence: The story he told was a complete lie.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເລື່ອງລາວທີ່ລາວເລົ່ານັ້ນເປັນການຕົວະທີ່ສົມບູນ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ມັກ, ບໍ່ມັກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She has a like for classical music.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມັກດົນຕີຄລາສສິກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊາຍແດນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The speed limit on this road is 50 miles per hour.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂີດຈຳກັດຄວາມໄວໃນຖະໜົນນີ້ແມ່ນ 50 ກິໂລແມັດຕໍ່ຊົ່ວໂມງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈຳກັດ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: You should limit your sugar intake.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຄວນຈໍາກັດການບໍລິໂພກ້ໍາຕານຂອງທ່ານ.

meaning list.meaning: ປາກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her lips were dry because of the cold weather.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮິມຝີປາກຂອງລາວແຫ້ງຍ້ອນອາກາດໜາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ທາດແຫຼວ
meaning list.sentence: Water is a vital liquid for all living beings.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນ້ໍາເປັນນ້ໍາທີ່ສໍາຄັນສໍາລັບສິ່ງທີ່ມີຊີວິດທັງຫມົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃນຮູບແບບຂອງແຫຼວ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The medication comes in liquid form.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຢາມາໃນຮູບແບບຂອງແຫຼວ.

meaning list.meaning: ວັນນະຄະດີ
meaning list.sentence: She is studying French literature at university.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮຽນວັນນະຄະດີຝຣັ່ງຢູ່ມະຫາວິທະຍາໄລ.

meaning list.meaning: ມີຊີວິດຊີວາ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The band performed live on stage.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວົງດົນຕີໄດ້ສະແດງສົດຢູ່ເທິງເວທີ.

meaning list.meaning: ມີຊີວິດຢູ່
meaning list.sentence: The match was broadcast live on TV.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການແຂ່ງຂັນໄດ້ຖ່າຍທອດສົດທາງໂທລະພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ດໍາລົງຊີວິດ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He is the only living member of the team.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນພຽງສະມາຊິກທີ່ລອດຊີວິດຂອງທີມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊີວິດ, ຊີວິດ
meaning list.sentence: She earns her living as a teacher.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຮັດໃຫ້ຊີວິດຂອງລາວເປັນຄູສອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄົນທ້ອງຖິ່ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The locals are very friendly to visitors.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະຊາຊົນທ້ອງຖິ່ນມີຄວາມເປັນມິດກັບນັກທ່ອງທ່ຽວຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄົ້ນ​ຫາ
meaning list.sentence: They were able to locate the missing child.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ສາມາດ​ຊອກ​ຫາ​ເດັກ​ທີ່​ຫາຍ​ສາບ​ສູນ​ໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ພົບເຫັນ, ຕັ້ງຢູ່ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The hotel is conveniently located near the airport.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງແຮມຕັ້ງຢູ່ທີ່ສະດວກສະບາຍຢູ່ໃກ້ກັບສະຫນາມບິນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຖານທີ່, ສະຖານທີ່
meaning list.sentence: This location is perfect for a picnic.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະຖານທີ່ນີ້ແມ່ນດີເລີດສໍາລັບການກິນເຂົ້າປ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດດດ່ຽວ, ໂດດດ່ຽວ
meaning list.sentence: She felt lonely after moving to a new city.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮູ້ສຶກໂດດດ່ຽວຫຼັງຈາກຍ້າຍໄປຢູ່ເມືອງໃໝ່.

meaning list.meaning: ການສູນເສຍ, ຄວາມເສຍຫາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The company reported a loss of profits last quarter.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ລາຍງານການສູນເສຍກໍາໄລໃນໄຕມາດທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼູຫຼາ
meaning list.sentence: Staying in a five-star hotel is a luxury for most people.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຢູ່ໃນໂຮງແຮມຫ້າດາວແມ່ນຟຸ່ມເຟືອຍສໍາລັບຄົນສ່ວນໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ບ້າ, ບ້າ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She went mad after hearing the news.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວບ້າຫຼັງຈາກໄດ້ຍິນຂ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: magic, magic (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The magician performed an amazing magic trick.
meaning list.sentence translation: magician ໄດ້ປະຕິບັດ trick magic incredible.

meaning list.meaning: ມະຫັດສະຈັນ
meaning list.sentence: The forest looked magical under the moonlight.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປ່າໄມ້ເບິ່ງມະຫັດສະຈັນພາຍໃຕ້ແສງເດືອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົ້ນຕໍ, ຕົ້ນຕໍ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The audience was mainly composed of students.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຊົມສ່ວນຫຼາຍແມ່ນນັກຮຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສູນການຄ້າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: We spent the afternoon shopping at the mall.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາໃຊ້ເວລາຕອນບ່າຍໄປຊື້ເຄື່ອງຢູ່ສູນການຄ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍລິຫານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company's management decided to expand internationally.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຄຸ້ມຄອງຂອງບໍລິສັດໄດ້ຕັດສິນໃຈທີ່ຈະຂະຫຍາຍໄປຕ່າງປະເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕະຫຼາດ
meaning list.sentence: They are planning to market their new product worldwide.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າວາງແຜນທີ່ຈະຕະຫຼາດຜະລິດຕະພັນໃຫມ່ຂອງພວກເຂົາໃນທົ່ວໂລກ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຕະຫຼາດ
meaning list.sentence: Effective marketing strategies can increase sales significantly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຍຸດທະສາດການຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີປະສິດທິພາບສາມາດເພີ່ມຍອດຂາຍໄດ້ຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ການແຕ່ງງານ
meaning list.sentence: Their marriage has lasted for over 20 years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການແຕ່ງງານຂອງພວກເຂົາໃຊ້ເວລາຫຼາຍກວ່າ 20 ປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂະນະດຽວກັນ, ໃນຂະນະດຽວກັນ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The children were playing outside; meanwhile, the adults prepared dinner.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍໄດ້ຫຼິ້ນຢູ່ນອກ; ໃນຂະນະດຽວກັນ, ຜູ້ໃຫຍ່ກະກຽມອາຫານຄ່ຳ.

meaning list.meaning: ວັດແທກ
meaning list.sentence: She measured the length of the table.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວວັດແທກຄວາມຍາວຂອງຕາຕະລາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ວັດແທກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Taking accurate measures is important in construction.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເປັນສິ່ງສໍາຄັນທີ່ຈະປະຕິບັດການວັດແທກທີ່ຖືກຕ້ອງໃນການກໍ່ສ້າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ປານກາງ, ບໍ່ໃຫຍ່ ຫຼື ນ້ອຍ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: I would like a medium-sized coffee, please.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຕ້ອງການກາເຟຂະຫນາດກາງ, ກະລຸນາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈິດ​ໃຈ​, ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ຈິດ​ໃຈ (adjective​)
meaning list.sentence: Regular exercise can improve your mental health.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການອອກກໍາລັງກາຍເປັນປົກກະຕິສາມາດປັບປຸງສຸຂະພາບຈິດຂອງທ່ານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ່າກ່າວເຖິງ, ຈື່ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: His contributions received a special mention during the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປະກອບສ່ວນຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ຖືກກ່າວເຖິງພິເສດຢູ່ໃນກອງປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັບສົນ, ສັບສົນ
meaning list.sentence: The kitchen was a mess after the party.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຮືອນຄົວແມ່ນລັງກິນອາຫານຫຼັງຈາກພັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ອ່ອນ, ອ່ອນ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The weather is mild during spring.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະພາບອາກາດບໍ່ຮຸນແຮງໃນພາກຮຽນ spring.

meaning list.meaning: ຂອງຂ້ອຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The workers extracted coal from the mine.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄົນງານຂຸດຄົ້ນຖ່ານຫີນຈາກບໍ່ແຮ່.

meaning list.meaning: ປະສົມ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: You need to mix the flour and water to make the dough.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເພື່ອເຮັດໃຫ້ dough, ທ່ານຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງປະສົມແປ້ງແລະນ້ໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະສົມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This recipe uses a mix of spices.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສູດນີ້ໃຊ້ເຄື່ອງເທດປະສົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະສົມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The mixture of colors created a beautiful painting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປະສົມຂອງສີໄດ້ສ້າງຮູບແຕ້ມທີ່ສວຍງາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ອາລົມ
meaning list.sentence: She is in a good mood today.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຢູ່ໃນອາລົມດີໃນມື້ນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ການເຄື່ອນໄຫວ, ການເຄື່ອນໄຫວ
meaning list.sentence: The player's next move determined the outcome of the game.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການເຄື່ອນໄຫວຕໍ່ໄປຂອງຜູ້ນໄດ້ກໍານົດຜົນໄດ້ຮັບຂອງເກມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂີ້ຕົມ
meaning list.sentence: The children were playing in the mud after the rain.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍໄດ້ຫຼິ້ນຢູ່ໃນຕົມຫຼັງຈາກຝົນຕົກ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຄາດຕະກຳ
meaning list.sentence: The police are investigating the murder case.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຳຫຼວດກຳລັງສືບສວນຄະດີຄາດຕະກຳ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂ້າ
meaning list.sentence: He was accused of murdering his business partner.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຖືກກ່າວຫາວ່າຄາດຕະກໍາຄູ່ຮ່ວມງານທຸລະກິດຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ້າມ
meaning list.sentence: Regular exercise helps to strengthen muscles.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການອອກກໍາລັງກາຍເປັນປົກກະຕິຈະຊ່ວຍໃຫ້ກ້າມຊີ້ນແຂງແຮງ.

meaning list.meaning: ດົນຕີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: We watched a wonderful musical last night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາໄດ້ເບິ່ງດົນຕີທີ່ຍິ່ງໃຫຍ່ໃນຄືນທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມລຶກລັບ, ຄວາມລັບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The origin of the artifact remains a mystery.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕົ້ນກໍາເນີດຂອງວຽກງານຍັງຄົງເປັນຄວາມລຶກລັບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕະປູ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She painted her nails red.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວທາສີເລັບຂອງລາວເປັນສີແດງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເລື່ອງ, ການບັນຍາຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The book's narrative was engaging and emotional.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການເທື່ອເນື່ອງຈາກຫນັງສືແມ່ນຈັບມືແລະອາລົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະແດງອອກ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The narrative style of the film was unique.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບແບບການເລົ່າເລື່ອງຂອງຮູບເງົາແມ່ນເປັນເອກະລັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊາດ, ຊາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The nation celebrated its independence day.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະເທດຊາດໄດ້ສະເຫຼີມສະຫຼອງວັນປະກາດເອກະລາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ທ້ອງຖິ່ນ, ພື້ນເມືອງ
meaning list.sentence: He is a native speaker of Spanish.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນຄົນພື້ນເມືອງຂອງແອສປາໂຍນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄົນພື້ນເມືອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The natives welcomed the visitors warmly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊາວ​ທ້ອງ​ຖິ່ນ​ໄດ້​ຕ້ອນຮັບ​ແຂກ​ຢ່າງ​ອົບ​ອຸ່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕາມທໍາມະຊາດ
meaning list.sentence: She is naturally talented in music.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີພອນສະຫວັນທາງດ້ານດົນຕີຕາມທໍາມະຊາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ແນ່ນອນ, ຈໍາເປັນ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: Expensive items are not necessarily better.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜະລິດຕະພັນລາຄາແພງແມ່ນບໍ່ຈໍາເປັນທີ່ດີກວ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕ້ອງການ, ຕ້ອງການ (modal verb)
meaning list.sentence: You need to study harder to pass the exam.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າ​ຕ້ອງ​ຮຽນ​ໜັກ​ຂຶ້ນ​ເພື່ອ​ຈະ​ເສັງ​ໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂັມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She threaded the needle to start sewing.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງໄດ້ເອົາເຂັມຂັດເພື່ອເລີ່ມຕົ້ນການຫຍິບ.

meaning list.meaning: ບ້ານໃກ້ເຮືອນຄຽງ, ສະພາບແວດລ້ອມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Our neighbourhood is very peaceful and friendly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບ້ານຂອງພວກເຮົາແມ່ນສະຫງົບແລະເປັນມິດຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: Neither ... ຫຼື (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: Neither of the answers is correct.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍ່ມີຄໍາຕອບທີ່ຖືກຕ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຄືອຂ່າຍ, ສຸດທິ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The fishermen repaired their nets before going out to sea.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊາວ​ປະມົງ​ໄດ້​ສ້ອມ​ແປງ​ຕາໜ່າງ​ກ່ອນ​ອອກ​ສູ່​ທະ​ເລ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕໍ່ໄປ, ຕໍ່ໄປນີ້
meaning list.sentence: What’s your plan for the next few days?
meaning list.sentence translation: ແຜນການຂອງທ່ານແມ່ນຫຍັງສໍາລັບສອງສາມມື້ຂ້າງຫນ້າ?

meaning list.meaning: Neither ... ຫຼື (ການສົມທົບ / adverb)
meaning list.sentence: He neither apologized nor showed any regret.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ບໍ່​ໄດ້​ຂໍ​ໂທດ ຫຼື​ສະແດງ​ຄວາມ​ເສຍໃຈ​ໃດໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຖານະການປົກກະຕິ
meaning list.sentence: Life is slowly returning to normal after the storm.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງຈາກພະຍຸ, ຊີວິດແມ່ນຊ້າໆກັບຄືນສູ່ສະພາບປົກກະຕິ.

meaning list.meaning: ເໜືອ, ເໜືອ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They visited the northern part of the country.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ໄປຢ້ຽມຢາມພາກເຫນືອຂອງປະເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັງເກດ, ຊີ້ບອກ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: Please note the changes in the schedule.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາສັງເກດການປ່ຽນແປງຕາຕະລາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃນປັດຈຸບັນ, ໃນເວລານີ້ (ການສົມທົບ)
meaning list.sentence: Now that we are here, let’s start the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເນື່ອງຈາກພວກເຮົາຢູ່ທີ່ນີ້, ໃຫ້ເລີ່ມຕົ້ນກອງປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ນິວເຄລຍ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Many countries are reducing their reliance on nuclear power.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼາຍ​ປະ​ເທດ​ພວມ​ຫຼຸດ​ຜ່ອນ​ການ​ເພິ່ງ​ພາ​ອາ​ໄສ​ພະ​ລັງ​ງານ​ນິວ​ເຄຼຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈະແຈ້ງ, ຈະແຈ້ງ
meaning list.sentence: It was obvious that she was upset about something.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເຫັນໄດ້ຊັດເຈນວ່າລາວຮູ້ສຶກເສຍໃຈກັບບາງສິ່ງບາງຢ່າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈະແຈ້ງ, ແນ່ນອນ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: He was obviously not happy with the decision.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວບໍ່ພໍໃຈຢ່າງຈະແຈ້ງກັບການຕັດສິນໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂອກາດ, ສະຖານະການພິເສດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her birthday is always a special occasion.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວັນເກີດແມ່ນເປັນໂອກາດພິເສດສະເໝີ.

meaning list.meaning: ເກີດຂຶ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: Earthquakes often occur without warning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແຜ່ນດິນໄຫວມັກຈະເກີດຂຶ້ນໂດຍບໍ່ມີການເຕືອນໄພ.

meaning list.meaning: ແປກ, ແປກ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: He has some odd habits that make him unique.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີນິໄສທີ່ແປກປະຫຼາດທີ່ເຮັດໃຫ້ລາວເປັນເອກະລັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ່າງເປັນທາງການ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The official announcement will be made tomorrow.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປະກາດຢ່າງເປັນທາງການຈະມີຂຶ້ນໃນມື້ອື່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍຸກສະໄໝ
meaning list.sentence: She likes wearing old-fashioned dresses.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງມັກນຸ່ງຊຸດເກົ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ກາລະຄັ້ງໜຶ່ງ (ສົມພັນ)
meaning list.sentence: Once you finish your homework, you can play video games.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເມື່ອ​ເຈົ້າ​ເຮັດ​ວຽກ​ບ້ານ​ໃຫ້​ສຳ​ເລັດ, ເຈົ້າ​ສາ​ມາດ​ຫຼິ້ນ​ວິ​ດີ​ໂອ​ເກມ​ໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຕິບັດການ, ປະຕິບັດການ
meaning list.sentence: The operation to rescue the trapped miners was successful.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ປະ​ຕິ​ບັດ​ການ​ຊ່ວຍ​ເຫຼືອ​ຄົນ​ງານ​ບໍ່​ແຮ່​ທີ່​ຕິດ​ຄ້າງ​ຢູ່​ນັ້ນ​ໄດ້​ສຳ​ເລັດ​ຜົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປັນລະບຽບ, ເປັນລະບຽບ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She is a very organized person who plans everything in advance.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນຄົນທີ່ມີການຈັດຕັ້ງຫຼາຍທີ່ວາງແຜນທຸກຢ່າງລ່ວງຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ຈັດງານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The event organizer ensured everything ran smoothly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຈັດງານໄດ້ຮັບປະກັນວ່າທຸກຢ່າງເປັນໄປດ້ວຍດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົ້ນສະບັບ, ຕົ້ນສະບັບ
meaning list.sentence: This painting is the original, not a copy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບແຕ້ມນີ້ແມ່ນຕົ້ນສະບັບ, ບໍ່ແມ່ນສໍາເນົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃນເບື້ອງຕົ້ນ, ຕົວຈິງແລ້ວ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The building was originally used as a library.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນເບື້ອງຕົ້ນ, ອາຄານໄດ້ຖືກນໍາໃຊ້ເປັນຫໍສະຫມຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕ້ອງການ, ຕ້ອງການ (modal verb)
meaning list.sentence: You ought to apologize for being late.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຄວນຂໍອະໄພສໍາລັບການມາຊ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂອງພວກເຮົາ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This house is ours.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຮືອນນີ້ແມ່ນຂອງພວກເຮົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ອາກາດເປີດ, ກາງແຈ້ງ
meaning list.sentence: They enjoy outdoor activities like hiking and camping.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າມັກກິດຈະກໍາກາງແຈ້ງເຊັ່ນ: ການຍ່າງປ່າ ແລະ camping.

meaning list.meaning: ນອກ, ນອກ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: We decided to eat outdoors since the weather was nice.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເນື່ອງ​ຈາກ​ວ່າ​ອາ​ກາດ​ແມ່ນ​ດີ​, ພວກ​ເຮົາ​ໄດ້​ຕັດ​ສິນ​ໃຈ​ທີ່​ຈະ​ກິນ​ອາ​ຫານ​ຢູ່​ນອກ​.

meaning list.meaning: ກະເປົ໋າ, ກະເປົ໋າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He carried a heavy pack on his hiking trip.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ຖື​ກະເປົ໋າ​ອັນ​ໜັກ​ໜ່ວງ​ໃນ​ການ​ເດີນ​ປ່າ​ຂອງ​ລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫໍ່, parcel (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The package was delivered to my house this morning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊຸດດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຖືກສົ່ງໄປເຮືອນຂອງຂ້ອຍໃນຕອນເຊົ້ານີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ເຈັບ, ເຈັບ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She had a painful experience at the dentist.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີປະສົບການທີ່ເຈັບປວດຢູ່ຫມໍແຂ້ວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈືດໆ, ຈືດໆ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her face turned pale when she heard the news.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃບໜ້າຂອງລາວຈືດຈາງເມື່ອໄດ້ຍິນຂ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: ພານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Heat the oil in a pan before adding the vegetables.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຮ້ອນນ້ໍາມັນໃນແຊ່ກ່ອນທີ່ຈະເພີ່ມຜັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂົ້າຮ່ວມ
meaning list.sentence: She decided to participate in the community event.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕັດສິນໃຈເຂົ້າຮ່ວມກິດຈະກໍາຊຸມຊົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດຍສະເພາະ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: I found the ending of the movie particularly moving.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້າພະເຈົ້າພົບເຫັນຕອນທ້າຍຂອງຮູບເງົາໂດຍສະເພາະແມ່ນຄວາມຮູ້ສຶກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜ່ານ, ຜ່ານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: You need a pass to enter the restricted area.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຕ້ອງການບັດຜ່ານເພື່ອເຂົ້າໄປໃນເຂດຈໍາກັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມກະຕືລືລົ້ນ, ຄວາມກະຕືລືລົ້ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her passion for painting is evident in her work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມມັກໃນການແຕ້ມຮູບຂອງລາວແມ່ນເຫັນໄດ້ຊັດເຈນໃນວຽກງານຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເສັ້ນທາງ, ເສັ້ນທາງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: We followed the path through the forest.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາໄປຕາມເສັ້ນທາງຜ່ານປ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຈ່າຍເງິນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The payment is due at the end of the month.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຊໍາລະຕ້ອງຈ່າຍໃນທ້າຍເດືອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫງົບ, ສະຫງົບ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The village was quiet and peaceful.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບ້ານແມ່ນງຽບສະຫງົບ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປີເຊັນ, ອັດຕາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: A large percentage of students passed the exam.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອັດຕາສ່ວນໃຫຍ່ຂອງນັກຮຽນຜ່ານການສອບເສັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ່າງສົມບູນ
meaning list.sentence: She performed the task perfectly without any mistakes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນປະຕິບັດວຽກງານຢ່າງສົມບູນໂດຍບໍ່ມີຂໍ້ຜິດພາດໃດໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ການສະແດງ, ການສະແດງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The band gave an outstanding performance last night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວົງດົນຕີໄດ້ໃຫ້ການສະແດງທີ່ໂດດເດັ່ນໃນຄືນທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ສ່ວນບຸກຄົນ, ສ່ວນບຸກຄົນ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: I will personally deliver the documents to your office.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຈະສົ່ງເອກະສານໃຫ້ຫ້ອງການຂອງເຈົ້າເປັນສ່ວນຕົວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊັກຊວນ
meaning list.sentence: She persuaded him to join the trip.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຊັກຊວນໃຫ້ນາງເຂົ້າຮ່ວມການເດີນທາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊ່າງພາບ
meaning list.sentence: The photographer captured beautiful shots of the wedding.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊ່າງຖ່າຍຮູບໄດ້ຖ່າຍຮູບທີ່ສວຍງາມຂອງງານແຕ່ງງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຖ່າຍຮູບ
meaning list.sentence: She is studying photography at the art school.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວກໍາລັງຮຽນການຖ່າຍຮູບຢູ່ໂຮງຮຽນສິລະປະ.

meaning list.meaning: pin, pushpin (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She used a pin to secure her dress.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງ​ໄດ້​ໃຊ້​ເຂັມ​ປັກ​ເຂັມ​ເພື່ອ​ຮັກສາ​ເສື້ອ​ຜ້າ​ຂອງ​ນາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ປັກໝຸດ, ແກ້ໄຂ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: He pinned the note to the bulletin board.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວປັກໝຸດບັນທຶກໃສ່ກະດານຂ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: ທໍ່ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The plumber repaired the broken pipe under the sink.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊ່າງປະປາສ້ອມແປງທໍ່ທີ່ແຕກຫັກພາຍໃຕ້ບ່ອນຈົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ວາງ, ວາງ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She carefully placed the vase on the table.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວວາງ vase ໄວ້ເທິງໂຕະຢ່າງລະມັດລະວັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການວາງແຜນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Proper planning is essential for a successful event.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການວາງແຜນທີ່ເຫມາະສົມແມ່ນສໍາຄັນສໍາລັບເຫດການທີ່ປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຸກ, ສຸກ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: We had a pleasant evening with friends.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາໄດ້ມີຕອນແລງທີ່ມີຄວາມສຸກກັບຫມູ່ເພື່ອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມສຸກ, ຄວາມສຸກ
meaning list.sentence: It's a pleasure to work with such a talented team.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເປັນຄວາມສຸກທີ່ຈະເຮັດວຽກຮ່ວມກັບທີມງານທີ່ມີພອນສະຫວັນດັ່ງກ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: ອຸດົມສົມບູນ, ອຸດົມສົມບູນ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There’s plenty of food for everyone.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີອາຫານຫຼາຍສໍາລັບທຸກຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເລື່ອງ, ນິທານ
meaning list.sentence: The plot of the movie was quite intriguing.
meaning list.sentence translation: ດິນຕອນຂອງຮູບເງົາແມ່ນຫນ້າສົນໃຈດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ບວກ, ນອກຈາກນັ້ນ (preposition)
meaning list.sentence: You will get a bonus plus your regular salary.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຈະໄດ້ຮັບໂບນັດນອກຈາກເງິນເດືອນປົກກະຕິຂອງເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ບົດກະວີ
meaning list.sentence: She wrote a beautiful poem about love.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຂຽນບົດກະວີທີ່ສວຍງາມກ່ຽວກັບຄວາມຮັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັກກະວີ
meaning list.sentence: The poet recited his work to the audience.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກ​ກະ​ວີ​ໄດ້​ອ່ານ​ວຽກ​ງານ​ຂອງ​ຕົນ​ໃຫ້​ຜູ້​ຊົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ບົດກະວີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She has a deep love for poetry.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ມີ​ຄວາມ​ຮັກ​ອັນ​ເລິກ​ເຊິ່ງ​ຕໍ່​ສິ​ລະ​ປະ​ກະ​ວີ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະແດງ, ຊີ້ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: He pointed to the map to explain the route.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຊີ້ໄປຫາແຜນທີ່ເພື່ອອະທິບາຍເສັ້ນທາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ພິດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The bottle contains a strong poison.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແກ້ວມີສານພິດທີ່ເຂັ້ມແຂງ.

meaning list.meaning: ພິດ
meaning list.sentence: He was accused of poisoning his rival.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຖືກກ່າວຫາວ່າວາງຢາພິດຄູ່ແຂ່ງຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປັນພິດ
meaning list.sentence: Some mushrooms are highly poisonous.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຫັດບາງຊະນິດມີພິດທີ່ສຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ນະໂຍບາຍ, ຫຼັກການ
meaning list.sentence: The company introduced a new refund policy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ນໍາສະເຫນີນະໂຍບາຍການກັບຄືນໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ທາງດ້ານການເມືອງ, ທາງດ້ານການເມືອງ
meaning list.sentence: The debate focused on political issues.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການໂຕ້ວາທີໄດ້ສຸມໃສ່ບັນຫາທາງດ້ານການເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັກການເມືອງ
meaning list.sentence: The politician gave a speech about climate change.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກ​ການ​ເມືອງ​ກ່າວ​ຄຳ​ປາ​ໄສ​ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ການ​ປ່ຽນ​ແປງ​ຂອງ​ດິນ​ຟ້າ​ອາ​ກາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການເມືອງ
meaning list.sentence: She has always been interested in politics.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມສົນໃຈທາງດ້ານການເມືອງຕະຫຼອດມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ພອດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The ship docked at the port early in the morning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຮືອໄດ້ເຂົ້າຈອດຢູ່ທີ່ທ່າເຮືອໃນຕອນເຊົ້າໃນຕອນເຊົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮູບຄົນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The artist painted a stunning portrait of the queen.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກສິລະປິນໄດ້ແຕ້ມຮູບທີ່ໂດດເດັ່ນຂອງລາຊິນີ.

meaning list.meaning: ບາງທີ, ຖ້າເປັນໄປໄດ້ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She will possibly join us for dinner.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານສາມາດເຂົ້າຮ່ວມກັບພວກເຮົາສໍາລັບຄ່ໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫມໍ້, ພາຊະນະ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She cooked the soup in a large pot.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວແຕ່ງແກງໃນຫມໍ້ໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຖອກອອກ, ເປົ່າຫວ່າງ
meaning list.sentence: He poured the coffee into the cup.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຖອກກາເຟໃສ່ຈອກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມທຸກຍາກ, ຄວາມທຸກຍາກ
meaning list.sentence: The organization works to reduce poverty in rural areas.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອົງການຈັດຕັ້ງເຮັດວຽກເພື່ອຫຼຸດຜ່ອນຄວາມທຸກຍາກໃນເຂດຊົນນະບົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂີ້ຝຸ່ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She used cocoa powder to make the cake.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງໄດ້ໃຊ້ຜົງໂກໂກ້ເພື່ອເຮັດເຄັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຂງແຮງ, ມີປະສິດທິພາບ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The speech had a powerful impact on the audience.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄຳ​ປາ​ໄສ​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ຜົນ​ສະທ້ອນ​ຢ່າງ​ແຮງ​ຕໍ່​ຜູ້​ຊົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະ​ຕິ​ບັດ​, ເປັນ​ປະ​ໂຫຍດ (adjective​)
meaning list.sentence: The course offers practical training for the job market.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັກສູດດັ່ງກ່າວມີການຝຶກອົບຮົມພາກປະຕິບັດສໍາລັບຕະຫຼາດວຽກເຮັດງານທໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ອະທິຖານ
meaning list.sentence: She prayed for her family's health and happiness.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວອະທິຖານເພື່ອສຸຂະພາບແລະຄວາມສຸກຂອງຄອບຄົວຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ສອງ (ອິຊິມ)
meaning list.sentence: They gathered in the church for a prayer service.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ເຕົ້າໂຮມກັນຢູ່ໃນໂບດເພື່ອການອະທິຖານ.

meaning list.meaning: ພະຍາກອນ, ພະຍາກອນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: His prediction about the weather turned out to be correct.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຄາດຄະເນຂອງລາວກ່ຽວກັບສະພາບອາກາດໄດ້ກາຍເປັນທີ່ຖືກຕ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ພ້ອມ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She was fully prepared for the exam.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມພ້ອມຢ່າງສົມບູນສໍາລັບການສອບເສັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການນໍາສະເຫນີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her presentation on climate change was very informative.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການນຳສະເໜີຂອງລາວກ່ຽວກັບການປ່ຽນແປງດິນຟ້າອາກາດແມ່ນມີຂໍ້ມູນຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ກົດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The press covered the story extensively.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສື່​ມວນ​ຊົນ​ໄດ້​ລົງ​ຂ່າວ​ຢ່າງ​ກວ້າງຂວາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະກັດກັ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: He pressed the button to start the machine.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວກົດປຸ່ມເພື່ອເລີ່ມຕົ້ນເຄື່ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມກົດດັນ, ຄວາມກົດດັນ
meaning list.sentence: The pressure to meet the deadline was intense.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມກົດດັນທີ່ຈະບັນລຸເສັ້ນຕາຍແມ່ນຮຸນແຮງ.

meaning list.meaning: ທຳທ່າ, ທຳທ່າ
meaning list.sentence: The children pretended to be pirates during the game.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍໄດ້ທຳທ່າເປັນໂຈນສະລັດໃນລະຫວ່າງເກມ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່ອນໜ້າ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her previous job experience helped her secure the new position.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະສົບການການເຮັດວຽກທີ່ຜ່ານມາຂອງລາວໄດ້ຊ່ວຍໃຫ້ລາວໄດ້ຮັບຕໍາແຫນ່ງໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່ອນ​ຫນ້າ​ນີ້, ກ່ອນ​ຫນ້າ​ນີ້ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: She had previously worked in a similar role.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຄີຍເຮັດວຽກໃນພາລະບົດບາດທີ່ຄ້າຍຄືກັນກ່ອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ບວດ, ບວດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The priest conducted the wedding ceremony.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະໂລຫິດໄດ້ດໍາເນີນພິທີແຕ່ງງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົ້ນຕໍ, ຕົ້ນຕໍ
meaning list.sentence: Education is a primary concern for the government.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສຶກສາແມ່ນຄວາມເປັນຫ່ວງຕົ້ນຕໍຂອງລັດຖະບານ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຈົ້າຊາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The prince attended the royal gala.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຊາຍໄດ້ເຂົ້າຮ່ວມງານມະໂຫລານຂອງກະສັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຈົ້າຍິງ
meaning list.sentence: The princess was admired for her charity work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຍິງໄດ້ຖືກຮັບຮູ້ສໍາລັບວຽກງານການກຸສົນຂອງນາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຮງພິມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The printing of the books was delayed due to technical issues.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການພິມປຶ້ມແມ່ນຊັກຊ້າຍ້ອນບັນຫາດ້ານວິຊາການ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັກໂທດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The prisoner was released after serving his sentence.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກໂທດໄດ້ຖືກປ່ອຍຕົວຫຼັງຈາກຖືກລົງໂທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສ່ວນຕົວ, ສ່ວນຕົວ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She prefers to keep her private life separate from her work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມັກຮັກສາຊີວິດສ່ວນຕົວຂອງລາວແຍກຕ່າງຫາກຈາກການເຮັດວຽກຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ຜະລິດ, ຜູ້ຜະລິດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The producer is responsible for financing the film.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຜະລິດແມ່ນຮັບຜິດຊອບສໍາລັບການສະຫນອງທຶນໃນຮູບເງົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຜະລິດ, ການຜະລິດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The production of the new model has already started.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຜະລິດຮູບແບບໃຫມ່ໄດ້ເລີ່ມຕົ້ນແລ້ວ.

meaning list.meaning: ອາຊີບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Teaching is a noble profession.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສອນເປັນອາຊີບທີ່ສູງສົ່ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ກຳໄລ, ກຳໄລ
meaning list.sentence: The company made a significant profit last year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ກໍາໄລຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍໃນປີກາຍນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ໂປຣແກມ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She learned how to program computers during her studies.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນ​ໄລ​ຍະ​ການ​ສຶກ​ສາ​, ລາວ​ໄດ້​ຮຽນ​ຮູ້​ຄອມ​ພິວ​ເຕີ​ໂຄງ​ການ​.

meaning list.meaning: ສົ່ງເສີມ, ຊຸກຍູ້ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The campaign was designed to promote healthy eating.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແຄມເປນໄດ້ຖືກອອກແບບເພື່ອສົ່ງເສີມການກິນອາຫານທີ່ມີສຸຂະພາບດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ເໝາະສົມ, ຖືກຕ້ອງ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: You need proper shoes for hiking.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຕ້ອງການເກີບທີ່ເຫມາະສົມສໍາລັບການຍ່າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖືກຕ້ອງ
meaning list.sentence: The machine isn't working properly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຄື່ອງເຮັດວຽກບໍ່ຖືກຕ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊັບສິນ, ຊັບສິນ
meaning list.sentence: The property is located near the city center.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊັບສິນຕັ້ງຢູ່ໃກ້ກັບໃຈກາງເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການປະທ້ວງ
meaning list.sentence: The protest against the new law attracted thousands of people.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ປະ​ທ້ວງ​ຕໍ່​ກົດ​ໝາຍ​ໃໝ່​ໄດ້​ດຶງ​ດູດ​ປະ​ຊາ​ຊົນ​ນັບ​ພັນ​ຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະທ້ວງ
meaning list.sentence: The workers protested against unfair treatment.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ຄົນ​ງານ​ປະ​ທ້ວງ​ຕໍ່​ການ​ປະ​ຕິ​ບັດ​ຢ່າງ​ບໍ່​ຍຸ​ຕິ​ທຳ.

meaning list.meaning: ພູມໃຈ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She was proud of her son's achievements.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວພູມໃຈໃນຄວາມສໍາເລັດຂອງລູກຊາຍຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ພິສູດ, ພິສູດ
meaning list.sentence: She managed to prove her innocence.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຈັດການເພື່ອພິສູດຄວາມບໍລິສຸດຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ດຶງ, ດຶງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He gave the door a strong pull to open it.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ຈູດ​ຢ່າງ​ແຮງ​ເພື່ອ​ເປີດ​ປະຕູ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົງໂທດ
meaning list.sentence: The teacher punished the student for being late.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຈານລົງໂທດນັກຮຽນມາຊ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ການລົງໂທດ
meaning list.sentence: The punishment for theft is severe in this country.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການລົງໂທດສໍາລັບການລັກຂະໂມຍແມ່ນຮ້າຍແຮງໃນປະເທດນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຍູ້, ຍູ້ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: With a strong push, the car moved forward.
meaning list.sentence translation: ດ້ວຍການຍູ້ແຮງ, ລົດໄດ້ກ້າວໄປຂ້າງຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຸນສົມບັດ, ຄຸນສົມບັດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She has the necessary qualifications for the job.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຄຸນສົມບັດທີ່ຈໍາເປັນສໍາລັບວຽກເຮັດງານທໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ມີຄຸນວຸດທິ, ມີຄວາມສາມາດ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He is highly qualified to lead the project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄຸນສົມບັດສູງໃນການຄຸ້ມຄອງໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: to qualify, to ກາຍ​ເປັນ​ສິດ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: She qualified for the finals after winning the race.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງຈາກຊະນະການແຂ່ງຂັນ, ລາວໄດ້ເຂົ້າຮອບສຸດທ້າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຖວ, ແຖວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There was a long queue at the ticket counter.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຄິວຍາວຢູ່ຫ້ອງຂາຍປີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ແຖວ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: We queued for an hour to get into the concert.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາລໍຖ້າຢູ່ໃນແຖວເປັນເວລາຫນຶ່ງຊົ່ວໂມງເພື່ອເຂົ້າໄປໃນຄອນເສີດ.

meaning list.meaning: to leave, to leave
meaning list.sentence: He decided to quit his job to pursue his passion.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ຕັດ​ສິນ​ໃຈ​ທີ່​ຈະ​ລາ​ອອກ​ຈາກ​ການ​ເຮັດ​ວຽກ​ຂອງ​ຕົນ​ເພື່ອ​ເຮັດ​ຕາມ​ຄວາມ​ມັກ​ຂອງ​ຕົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຳເວົ້າ
meaning list.sentence: The book starts with a famous quotation from Einstein.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປື້ມເລີ່ມຕົ້ນດ້ວຍຄໍາເວົ້າທີ່ມີຊື່ສຽງຈາກ Einstein.

meaning list.meaning: quote
meaning list.sentence: She quoted a line from her favorite novel.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ອ້າງເຖິງປະໂຫຍກຈາກນະວະນິຍາຍທີ່ລາວມັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຳເວົ້າ
meaning list.sentence: The article includes several quotes from the author.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບົດຄວາມປະກອບມີຄໍາເວົ້າຫຼາຍຄໍາຈາກຜູ້ຂຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊື້ອຊາດ
meaning list.sentence: People of every race are welcome at the festival.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຊີນ​ຄົນ​ທຸກ​ເຜົ່າ​ເຂົ້າ​ຮ່ວມ​ງານ​ບຸນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊື້ອຊາດ
meaning list.sentence: Car racing is a popular sport worldwide.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການແຂ່ງລົດອັດຕະໂນມັດເປັນກິລາທີ່ນິຍົມທົ່ວໂລກ.

meaning list.meaning: range, range (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The price range for these products varies greatly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລະດັບລາຄາຂອງຜະລິດຕະພັນເຫຼົ່ານີ້ແຕກຕ່າງກັນຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫາຍາກ, ບໍ່ເລື້ອຍໆ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This bird is a rare species found only in this region.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນົກຊະນິດນີ້ເປັນຊະນິດທີ່ຫາຍາກທີ່ພົບເຫັນຢູ່ໃນພາກພື້ນນີ້ເທົ່ານັ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ຄ່ອຍ
meaning list.sentence: He rarely goes out during the week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວບໍ່ຄ່ອຍອອກໄປໃນອາທິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຕິກິລິຍາ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her reaction to the surprise was priceless.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະຕິກິລິຍາຂອງລາວຕໍ່ກັບຄວາມແປກໃຈແມ່ນບໍ່ມີຄ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເປັນຈິງ
meaning list.sentence: Virtual reality is becoming increasingly popular.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມເປັນຈິງແລ້ວ virtual ກໍາລັງກາຍເປັນທີ່ນິຍົມຫລາຍຂຶ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃບຮັບເງິນ, voucher (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Keep the receipt as proof of purchase.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮັກສາໃບຮັບເງິນໄວ້ເປັນຫຼັກຖານການຊື້.

meaning list.meaning: ຄໍາ​ແນະ​ນໍາ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: The doctor gave her a recommendation to rest more.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຫມໍໄດ້ແນະນໍາລາວໃຫ້ພັກຜ່ອນຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ການອ້າງອິງ, ຄຸນລັກສະນະ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Please provide two references with your application.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃຫ້ສອງເອກະສານອ້າງອີງກັບຄໍາຮ້ອງສະຫມັກຂອງທ່ານ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະທ້ອນ, ຄິດ
meaning list.sentence: The mirror reflects the light into the room.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະຈົກສະທ້ອນແສງເຂົ້າໄປໃນຫ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ປົກກະຕິ
meaning list.sentence: She exercises regularly to stay fit.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວອອກກໍາລັງກາຍເປັນປົກກະຕິເພື່ອໃຫ້ມີຮູບຮ່າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຕິເສດ
meaning list.sentence: The manager rejected the proposal for the new project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຈັດການໄດ້ປະຕິເສດການສະເຫນີໂຄງການໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ເຊື່ອມ​ໂຍງ​, ການ​ເຊື່ອມ​ຕໍ່ (verb​)
meaning list.sentence: I can relate to her experience because I’ve been through the same situation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍສາມາດເຂົ້າໃຈປະສົບການຂອງລາວໄດ້ເພາະວ່າຂ້ອຍໄດ້ຜ່ານສະຖານະການດຽວກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່ກ່ຽວຂ້ອງ, ເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her research is related to environmental issues.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຄົ້ນຄວ້າຂອງລາວກ່ຽວຂ້ອງກັບບັນຫາສິ່ງແວດລ້ອມ.

meaning list.meaning: ການພົວພັນ, ການເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The report highlighted the relation between diet and health.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບົດລາຍງານໄດ້ຍົກໃຫ້ເຫັນຄວາມສໍາພັນລະຫວ່າງອາຫານແລະສຸຂະພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ພີ່ນ້ອງ, ພີ່ນ້ອງ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The success of the program is relative to the funding available.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມສໍາເລັດຂອງໂຄງການແມ່ນກ່ຽວຂ້ອງກັບການສະຫນອງທຶນທີ່ມີຢູ່.

meaning list.meaning: ພີ່ນ້ອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She invited all her relatives to the wedding.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ເຊີນ​ຍາດ​ພີ່​ນ້ອງ​ທັງ​ໝົດ​ຂອງ​ລາວ​ເຂົ້າ​ຮ່ວມ​ງານ​ແຕ່ງ​ດອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜ່ອນຄາຍ, ສະຫງົບ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She felt relaxed after the yoga session.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງຮູ້ສຶກຜ່ອນຄາຍຫຼັງຈາກກອງປະຊຸມໂຍຄະ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜ່ອນຄາຍ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The music was very relaxing.
meaning list.sentence translation: ດົນຕີແມ່ນຜ່ອນຄາຍຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ປ່ອຍ
meaning list.sentence: The company released a new version of the software.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ອອກສະບັບໃຫມ່ຂອງຊອບແວ.

meaning list.meaning: ປ່ອຍ, ເຜີຍແພ່ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The release of the movie was delayed.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປ່ອຍຮູບເງົາໄດ້ຖືກຊັກຊ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊື່ອຖືໄດ້
meaning list.sentence: He is a very reliable friend.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນເພື່ອນທີ່ເຊື່ອຖືໄດ້ຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ສາດສະໜາ
meaning list.sentence: Freedom of religion is a fundamental right.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເສລີພາບໃນການນັບຖືສາສະ ໜາ ແມ່ນສິດທິພື້ນຖານ.

meaning list.meaning: ສາດສະໜາ, ສັດທາ
meaning list.sentence: He is very religious and attends church every Sunday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວນັບຖືສາສະໜາຫຼາຍ ແລະໄປໂບດທຸກໆວັນອາທິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢູ່ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: Despite the challenges, she remained calm.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຖິງວ່າຈະມີຄວາມຫຍຸ້ງຍາກ, ລາວຍັງຄົງສະຫງົບ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຕືອນ
meaning list.sentence: Please remind me to call the doctor tomorrow.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາເຕືອນຂ້ອຍໃຫ້ໂທຫາທ່ານຫມໍມື້ອື່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄກ, ໄກ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They live in a remote village in the mountains.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາອາໄສຢູ່ໃນບ້ານຫ່າງໄກສອກຫຼີກໃນພູເຂົາ.

meaning list.meaning: Kira (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The monthly rent for the apartment is quite high.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄ່າເຊົ່າປະຈໍາເດືອນຂອງອາພາດເມັນແມ່ນຂ້ອນຂ້າງສູງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊົ່າ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: We rented a car for our road trip.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາເຊົ່າລົດສໍາລັບການເດີນທາງຂອງພວກເຮົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ສ້ອມແປງ, ສ້ອມແປງ
meaning list.sentence: The repair of the broken window took all morning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນໃຊ້ເວລາໃນຕອນເຊົ້າທັງຫມົດເພື່ອສ້ອມແປງປ່ອງຢ້ຽມທີ່ແຕກຫັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ອີກເທື່ອຫນຶ່ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The show will air a repeat of last week's episode tonight.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສະແດງຈະອອກອາກາດຄືນຕອນຂອງອາທິດທີ່ຜ່ານມາໃນຄືນນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຊ້ຳໆ
meaning list.sentence: Her repeated attempts to fix the problem failed.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການພະຍາຍາມຊ້ຳໆເພື່ອແກ້ໄຂບັນຫານັ້ນບໍ່ປະສົບຜົນສຳເລັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປັນຕົວແທນ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The lawyer represents his client in court.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະ​ນາຍ​ຄວາມ​ເປັນ​ຕົວ​ແທນ​ລູກ​ຄ້າ​ຂອງ​ຕົນ​ຢູ່​ໃນ​ສານ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຕ້ອງການ, ຕ້ອງການ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: She requested more information about the project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮ້ອງຂໍຂໍ້ມູນເພີ່ມເຕີມກ່ຽວກັບໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕ້ອງການ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: This task requires a lot of patience.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວຽກງານນີ້ຮຽກຮ້ອງໃຫ້ມີຄວາມອົດທົນຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຈອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: We made a reservation at a nice restaurant for dinner.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາໄດ້ສັ່ງຈອງຢູ່ຮ້ານອາຫານທີ່ສວຍງາມສໍາລັບຄ່ໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່ມາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Natural resources like water and minerals are essential for life.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊັບພະຍາກອນທໍາມະຊາດເຊັ່ນ: ນ້ໍາແລະແຮ່ທາດແມ່ນມີຄວາມຈໍາເປັນສໍາລັບຊີວິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຄົາລົບ
meaning list.sentence: He has great respect for his teacher.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ມີ​ຄວາມ​ນັບຖື​ຢ່າງ​ສູງ​ຕໍ່​ຄູ​ສອນ​ຂອງ​ລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຄົາລົບ
meaning list.sentence: You should respect other people's opinions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຄວນເຄົາລົບຄວາມຄິດເຫັນຂອງຄົນອື່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຮັບຜິດຊອບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Taking care of the family is a big responsibility.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການດູແລຄອບຄົວເປັນຄວາມຮັບຜິດຊອບອັນໃຫຍ່ຫຼວງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮັບຜິດຊອບ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He is responsible for managing the team.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮັບຜິດຊອບໃນການຄຸ້ມຄອງທີມງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫຼຸບ
meaning list.sentence: The changes resulted in a significant improvement.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປ່ຽນແປງດັ່ງກ່າວເຮັດໃຫ້ການປັບປຸງຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ກິນເບັ້ຍບໍານານ
meaning list.sentence: He plans to retire at the age of 65.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວວາງແຜນທີ່ຈະກິນເບັ້ຍບໍານານຢູ່ທີ່ 65 ປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ບຳນານ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: My grandfather is a retired teacher.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພໍ່ຕູ້ຂອງຂ້ອຍເປັນຄູບໍານານ.

meaning list.meaning: ທົບທວນ, ແກ້ໄຂ
meaning list.sentence: You should revise your notes before the exam.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຄວນທົບທວນບັນທຶກຂອງເຈົ້າກ່ອນການສອບເສັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ວົງແຫວນ
meaning list.sentence: She wore a beautiful diamond ring.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງໄດ້ໃສ່ແຫວນເພັດທີ່ສວຍງາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະເດັດຂຶ້ນ, ເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There has been a rise in fuel prices recently.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີການເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນຂອງລາຄານໍ້າມັນໃນບໍ່ດົນມານີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມສ່ຽງ, ອັນຕະລາຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Smoking increases the risk of heart disease.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສູບຢາເພີ່ມຄວາມສ່ຽງຂອງພະຍາດຫົວໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ສ່ຽງ
meaning list.sentence: He risked his life to save the child.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສ່ຽງຊີວິດຂອງລາວເພື່ອຊ່ວຍເດັກນ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຸ່ນຍົນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The robot can perform simple tasks like cleaning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຸ່ນຍົນສາມາດປະຕິບັດວຽກງານທີ່ງ່າຍດາຍເຊັ່ນການທໍາຄວາມສະອາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ມ້ວນ
meaning list.sentence: The ball rolled down the hill.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບານໄດ້ມ້ວນລົງຄ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ມ້ວນ, ມ້ວນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He ate a sandwich made with a bread roll.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວກິນແຊນວິດທີ່ເຮັດດ້ວຍເຂົ້າຈີ່.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຣແມນຕິກ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They had a romantic dinner by candlelight.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ມີ​ຄ​່​ໍ​າ romantic ໂດຍ​ແສງ​ທຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊືອກ, ເຊືອກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He used a rope to tie the boat to the dock.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໃຊ້​ເຊືອກ​ມັດ​ເຮືອ​ໃສ່​ທ່າ​ເຮືອ.

meaning list.meaning: rough, harsh (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The surface of the table was rough and uneven.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພື້ນຜິວຂອງຕາຕະລາງແມ່ນ rough ແລະບໍ່ສະເຫມີພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ລຳດັບ, ຊຸດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The students sat in a row during the ceremony.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກສຶກສາໄດ້ນັ່ງແຖວກັນໃນລະຫວ່າງພິທີ.

meaning list.meaning: ລາດຊະວົງ
meaning list.sentence: The royal family attended the charity event.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄອບຄົວລາດຊະວົງໄດ້ເຂົ້າຮ່ວມງານກຸສົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຣັກບີ້ (ອິຊິມ)
meaning list.sentence: Rugby is a popular sport in New Zealand.
meaning list.sentence translation: Rugby ເປັນກິລາທີ່ນິຍົມໃນນິວຊີແລນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປົກຄອງ, ປົກຄອງ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The queen ruled the country for over 50 years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະລາຊິນີໄດ້ປົກຄອງປະເທດເປັນເວລາຫຼາຍກວ່າ 50 ປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມປອດໄພ, ຄວາມປອດໄພ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Wearing a helmet is essential for your safety.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການໃສ່ໝວກກັນກະທົບແມ່ນມີຄວາມສຳຄັນຫຼາຍຕໍ່ຄວາມປອດໄພຂອງເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຮືອໃບ
meaning list.sentence: The boat's sail was torn by the strong wind.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຮືອ​ຂອງ​ເຮືອ​ໄດ້​ຫັກ​ຍ້ອນ​ລົມ​ແຮງ.

meaning list.meaning: ທະຫານເຮືອ
meaning list.sentence: The sailor navigated the ship through the storm.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະຫານເຮືອໄດ້ນໍາພາເຮືອຜ່ານພາຍຸ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົວຢ່າງ, ຕົວຢ່າງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The lab collected a water sample for testing.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫ້ອງທົດລອງໄດ້ເກັບຕົວຢ່າງນ້ໍາເພື່ອທົດສອບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The children built castles in the sand.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍກໍ່ສ້າງ Castle ໃນດິນຊາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະແກນ, ກວດກາ
meaning list.sentence: She scanned the document for errors.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະແກນເອກະສານສໍາລັບຄວາມຜິດພາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ວິທະຍາສາດ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The research was based on scientific evidence.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຄົ້ນຄວ້າແມ່ນອີງໃສ່ຫຼັກຖານທາງວິທະຍາສາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຖານະການ, ຂໍ້ຄວາມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The actor memorized the entire script before the rehearsal.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກສະແດງໄດ້ຈົດຈໍາບົດເລື່ອງທັງຫມົດກ່ອນການຝຶກຊ້ອມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮູບປັ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: The museum displayed a famous marble sculpture.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫໍພິພິທະພັນໄດ້ສະແດງຮູບປັ້ນຫີນອ່ອນທີ່ມີຊື່ສຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ມັດທະຍົມ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Safety is our primary concern, and speed is secondary.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມປອດໄພແມ່ນບູລິມະສິດອັນທໍາອິດຂອງພວກເຮົາ, ຄວາມໄວແມ່ນຮອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມປອດໄພ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The airport has increased its security measures.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະຫນາມບິນໄດ້ເພີ່ມມາດຕະການຄວາມປອດໄພ.

meaning list.meaning: ແກ່ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He planted the seeds in the garden.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວປູກເມັດພືດຢູ່ໃນສວນ.

meaning list.meaning: ມີເຫດຜົນ, ສະຫລາດ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: It is sensible to save money for emergencies.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເຮັດໃຫ້ຄວາມຮູ້ສຶກທີ່ຈະຊ່ວຍປະຢັດເງິນສໍາລັບການສຸກເສີນ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຍກ
meaning list.sentence: You should separate your clothes by color before washing.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກ່ອນທີ່ຈະຊັກ, ທ່ານຄວນຈັດລຽງເຄື່ອງນຸ່ງຂອງເຈົ້າຕາມສີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ່າງຈິງຈັງ
meaning list.sentence: He takes his responsibilities very seriously.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເອົາຄວາມຮັບຜິດຊອບຂອງລາວຢ່າງຈິງຈັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ແມ່ບ້ານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The servant prepared tea for the guests.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແມ່ບ້ານກະກຽມຊາໃຫ້ແຂກ.

meaning list.meaning: ວາງ, ວາງ
meaning list.sentence: She set the plates on the table for dinner.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວວາງຈານໄວ້ເທິງໂຕະສໍາລັບຄ່ໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕັ້ງ, ກຸ່ມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The box contains a set of tools.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກ່ອງມີບາງເຄື່ອງມື.

meaning list.meaning: ສະພາບແວດລ້ອມ, ການຕັ້ງຄ່າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The story is set in a rural setting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເລື່ອງເກີດຂຶ້ນຢູ່ໃນເຂດຊົນນະບົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The survey recorded the sex of each participant.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສໍາຫຼວດໄດ້ບັນທຶກເພດຂອງຜູ້ເຂົ້າຮ່ວມແຕ່ລະຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພດ
meaning list.sentence: They discussed sexual health in the seminar.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນກອງປະຊຸມສໍາມະນາ, ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ປຶກສາຫາລືກ່ຽວກັບສຸຂະພາບທາງເພດ.

meaning list.meaning: tremor, tremor (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: He felt a slight shake during the earthquake.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮູ້ສຶກສັ່ນເລັກນ້ອຍໃນລະຫວ່າງການແຜ່ນດິນໄຫວ.

meaning list.meaning: ແບ່ງປັນ, ແບ່ງປັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Each partner gets an equal share of the profits.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູ່ຮ່ວມງານແຕ່ລະຄົນໄດ້ຮັບສ່ວນແບ່ງເທົ່າທຽມກັນຂອງຜົນກໍາໄລ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຫຼມ, ຊັດເຈນ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The knife is very sharp and can cut through anything.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແຜ່ນໃບແມ່ນແຫຼມຫຼາຍແລະສາມາດຕັດຫຍັງໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: Raf (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The books are neatly arranged on the shelf.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປຶ້ມຖືກຈັດລຽງຢ່າງເປັນລະບຽບຢູ່ເທິງຊັ້ນວາງ.

meaning list.meaning: Shell, bullet (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The shell of the turtle is very hard.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເປືອກຂອງເຕົ່າແມ່ນແຂງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ປ່ຽນ, shift (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She works the night shift at the hospital.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຮັດວຽກປ່ຽນກາງຄືນຢູ່ໂຮງໝໍ.

meaning list.meaning: ສ່ອງແສງ
meaning list.sentence: The sun shines brightly in the morning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນຕອນເຊົ້າ, ແສງຕາເວັນຈະສະຫວ່າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົດໃສ
meaning list.sentence: She polished the table until it was shiny.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຂັດຕາຕະລາງຈົນກ່ວາມັນເຫຼື້ອມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫນໍ່ໄມ້ສ່ວນຫຼາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The hunter shot at the bird but missed.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລ່າ​ສຸດ​ໄດ້​ຍິງ​ໃສ່​ນົກ​ຊະ​ນິດ​ແຕ່​ພາດ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຂີ້ອາຍ, ຂີ້ອາຍ
meaning list.sentence: She is too shy to speak in front of a crowd.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຂີ້ອາຍເກີນໄປທີ່ຈະເວົ້າຕໍ່ຫນ້າຝູງຊົນ.

meaning list.meaning: view, view (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The sight of the sunset was breathtaking.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທັດສະນະຂອງ sunset ແມ່ນ breathtaking.

meaning list.meaning: ສັນຍານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The traffic light turned green, signaling the cars to move.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໄຟຈະລາຈອນປ່ຽນເປັນສີຂຽວ, ສົ່ງສັນຍານໃຫ້ລົດຍ້າຍອອກໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັນຍານ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: He signaled the waiter to bring the bill.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສົ່ງສັນຍານໃຫ້ຜູ້ຮັບໃຊ້ເອົາໃບບິນຄ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ງຽບ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The library is a silent place for studying.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫໍສະໝຸດເປັນບ່ອນຮຽນທີ່ງຽບສະຫງົບ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂງ່, ໂງ່ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: That was a silly mistake you could have avoided.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນີ້ແມ່ນຄວາມຜິດພາດທີ່ໂງ່ທີ່ທ່ານສາມາດຫລີກລ້ຽງໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຄ້າຍຄືກັນ
meaning list.sentence: There is a striking similarity between the twins.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຄວາມຄ້າຍຄືກັນທີ່ໂດດເດັ່ນລະຫວ່າງຄູ່ແຝດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄ້າຍຄືກັນ
meaning list.sentence: The two projects were similarly successful.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທັງສອງໂຄງການໄດ້ຮັບຜົນສໍາເລັດທີ່ຄ້າຍຄືກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ພຽງແຕ່, ພຽງແຕ່ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: She simply explained the problem to everyone.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວພຽງແຕ່ອະທິບາຍບັນຫາໃຫ້ກັບທຸກຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕັ້ງແຕ່ນັ້ນມາ
meaning list.sentence: I haven't seen him since last year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍບໍ່ໄດ້ເຫັນລາວຕັ້ງແຕ່ປີທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈົມ, ຈົມລົງ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The ship sank after hitting an iceberg.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກຳ​ປັ່ນ​ລຳ​ນີ້​ໄດ້​ຈົມ​ລົງ ຫຼັງ​ຈາກ​ໄດ້​ຕີ​ພູ​ນ້ຳ​ແຂງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕ່ອນຂອງຂ້ອຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She ate a slice of cake after dinner.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ກິນເຄັກຫຼັງອາຫານແລງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕັດ, ຕັດ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: He sliced the bread for breakfast.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຊອຍເຂົ້າຈີ່ສໍາລັບອາຫານເຊົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ເລັກນ້ອຍ, ເລັກນ້ອຍ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The temperature has dropped slightly since yesterday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອຸນຫະພູມໄດ້ຫຼຸດລົງເລັກນ້ອຍນັບຕັ້ງແຕ່ມື້ວານນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຊ້າລົງ
meaning list.sentence: The car slowed down as it approached the curve.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດໄດ້ຊ້າລົງໃນຂະນະທີ່ມັນເຂົ້າໃກ້ໂຄ້ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫລາດ, ທັນສະໄຫມ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He is a smart student who excels in mathematics.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກຮຽນອັດສະລິຍະທີ່ເກັ່ງວິຊາຄະນິດສາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ້ຽງ, ກ້ຽງ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The surface of the table is smooth and shiny.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພື້ນຜິວຂອງຕາຕະລາງແມ່ນກ້ຽງແລະເຫຼື້ອມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊອບແວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company develops software for data analysis.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດພັດທະນາຊອບແວສໍາລັບການວິເຄາະຂໍ້ມູນ.

meaning list.meaning: ດິນ
meaning list.sentence: The farmer tested the soil to ensure it was fertile.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊາວກະສິກອນໄດ້ທົດສອບດິນເພື່ອໃຫ້ແນ່ໃຈວ່າມັນອຸດົມສົມບູນ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຂງ, ແຂງ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The chair is made of solid wood.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເກົ້າອີ້ແມ່ນເຮັດດ້ວຍໄມ້ແຂງ.

meaning list.meaning: ທາດແຂງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Water changes from a liquid to a solid at freezing point.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນ້ໍາປ່ຽນຈາກຂອງແຫຼວເປັນແຂງຢູ່ທີ່ຈຸດແຊ່ແຂງຂອງມັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຍກ, ແຍກ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She sorted the clothes by color before washing.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກ່ອນທີ່ຈະຊັກ, ລາວຈັດລຽງເຄື່ອງນຸ່ງຕາມສີ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຕ້, ໃຕ້ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They traveled to the southern part of the country.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ເດີນທາງໄປພາກໃຕ້ຂອງປະເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດຍ​ສະ​ເພາະ​, ໃນ​ວິ​ທີ​ການ​ສະ​ເພາະ​ໃດ​ຫນຶ່ງ (adverb​)
meaning list.sentence: The product is designed specifically for outdoor use.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜະລິດຕະພັນໄດ້ຖືກອອກແບບໂດຍສະເພາະສໍາລັບການນໍາໃຊ້ນອກ.

meaning list.meaning: ການໃຊ້ຈ່າຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The government reduced public spending to balance the budget.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດ​ຖະ​ບານ​ຫຼຸດ​ຜ່ອນ​ການ​ໃຊ້​ຈ່າຍ​ສາ​ທາ​ລະ​ນະ​ເພື່ອ​ດຸ່ນ​ດ່ຽງ​ງົບ​ປະ​ມານ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຜັດ, ຮ້ອນ (ນາມສະກຸນ)
meaning list.sentence: He enjoys eating spicy food like curry.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມັກກິນອາຫານເຜັດເຊັ່ນແກງ.

meaning list.meaning: ວິນຍານ, ອຳນາດທາງວິນຍານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her spirit remained strong despite the challenges.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຖິງວ່າຈະມີຄວາມຫຍຸ້ງຍາກ, ຈິດໃຈຂອງລາວຍັງຄົງເຂັ້ມແຂງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເວົ້າ, ປາກ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: English is widely spoken around the world.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພາສາອັງກິດຖືກເວົ້າຢ່າງກວ້າງຂວາງໃນທົ່ວໂລກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈຸດ, ສະຖານທີ່ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This is the perfect spot for a picnic.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນີ້ແມ່ນສະຖານທີ່ທີ່ສົມບູນແບບສໍາລັບການກິນເຂົ້າປ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຜ່, ກະຈາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The news of their engagement spread quickly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ່າວ​ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ການ​ມີ​ສ່ວນ​ຮ່ວມ​ຂອງ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ແຜ່​ຂະ​ຫຍາຍ​ຢ່າງ​ວ່ອງ​ໄວ​.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດດ
meaning list.sentence: The cat sprang onto the windowsill.
meaning list.sentence translation: cat ໄດ້ jumped ສຸດ sill ປ່ອງຢ້ຽມ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະໜາມກິລາ
meaning list.sentence: The game will be held at the national stadium.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການແຂ່ງຂັນຈະຈັດຂຶ້ນທີ່ສະໜາມກິລາແຫ່ງຊາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ບຸກຄະລາກອນ, ພະນັກງານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The hotel staff were very helpful and polite.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະນັກງານໂຮງແຮມມີປະໂຫຍດຫຼາຍ ແລະສຸພາບຮຽບຮ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ມາດຕະຖານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This product meets the highest safety standards.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜະລິດຕະພັນນີ້ຕອບສະຫນອງມາດຕະຖານຄວາມປອດໄພສູງສຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ມາດຕະຖານ, ທຳມະດາ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The room comes with standard amenities.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫ້ອງມາພ້ອມກັບສິ່ງອໍານວຍຄວາມສະດວກມາດຕະຖານ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ລັດ (adjective​)
meaning list.sentence: The state authorities issued new regulations.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອຳນາດ​ການ​ປົກຄອງ​ລັດ​ໄດ້​ອອກ​ລະບຽບ​ການ​ໃໝ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຊີ້ບອກ, ສະແດງອອກ
meaning list.sentence: The document clearly states the rules.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເອກະສານດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ລະບຸກົດລະບຽບຢ່າງຈະແຈ້ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຖິຕິ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The statistic shows an increase in population growth.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະຖິຕິສະແດງໃຫ້ເຫັນການຂະຫຍາຍຕົວຂອງປະຊາກອນເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮູບປັ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: The statue in the park is over a hundred years old.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບປັ້ນຢູ່ໃນສວນສາທາລະນະມີອາຍຸຫຼາຍກວ່າຮ້ອຍປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍຶດຕິດ
meaning list.sentence: He stuck the photo to the wall with tape.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ຖ່າຍ​ຮູບ​ໃສ່​ຝາ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄມ້, ຂາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The dog fetched the stick from the field.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໝາ​ເອົາ​ໄມ້​ມາ​ຈາກ​ທົ່ງ​ນາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍັງ, ສະຫງົບ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The water in the lake was perfectly still.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນ້ໍາໃນທະເລສາບແມ່ນຍັງຫມົດ.

meaning list.meaning: to store, to keep (ຄຳ​ກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The documents are stored in the archive.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເອກະສານຖືກເກັບໄວ້ໃນຮວບຮວມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄົນແປກໜ້າ, ຄົນທີ່ບໍ່ຄຸ້ນເຄີຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: A stranger asked me for directions to the station.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄົນແປກໜ້າຖາມຂ້ອຍທາງໄປສະຖານີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເຂັ້ມແຂງ, ຄວາມອົດທົນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her physical strength allowed her to carry the heavy box.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມ​ເຂັ້ມ​ແຂງ​ທາງ​ດ້ານ​ຮ່າງ​ກາຍ​ຂອງ​ພຣະ​ອົງ​ໄດ້​ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ເຂົາ​ສາ​ມາດ​ບັນ​ຈຸ​ຫນັກ​ໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊືອກ, ເຊືອກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He tied the parcel with a piece of string.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພຣະອົງໄດ້ tied ຊຸດທີ່ມີສິ້ນຂອງຊ່ອຍແນ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ່າງແຂງແຮງ
meaning list.sentence: I strongly recommend this book for anyone interested in history.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຂໍແນະນຳປຶ້ມຫົວນີ້ໃຫ້ທຸກຄົນທີ່ສົນໃຈເລື່ອງປະຫວັດສາດ.

meaning list.meaning: Studio (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The artist spends most of her time in her studio.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກສິລະປິນໃຊ້ເວລາສ່ວນໃຫຍ່ຢູ່ໃນສະຕູດິໂອຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ສິ່ງ, ສິ່ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Could you move your stuff off the table?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າສາມາດຍ້າຍສິ່ງຕ່າງໆຂອງເຈົ້າອອກຈາກໂຕະໄດ້ບໍ?

meaning list.meaning: ເນື້ອໃນ, ເນື້ອໃນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The chemical substance is harmful to humans.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສານເຄມີເປັນອັນຕະລາຍຕໍ່ມະນຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຳເລັດຜົນ
meaning list.sentence: She successfully completed the project on time.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ສໍາເລັດໂຄງການຕາມເວລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະທັນຫັນ, ບໍ່ຄາດຄິດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The car came to a sudden stop in the middle of the road.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດຄັນດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຢຸດຢ່າງກະທັນຫັນຢູ່ກາງທາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ທົນທຸກ, ທົນທຸກ
meaning list.sentence: Many people suffered during the economic crisis.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະຊາຊົນຈໍານວນຫຼາຍໄດ້ຮັບຄວາມເສຍຫາຍໃນໄລຍະວິກິດການເສດຖະກິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເໝາະສົມ, ເໝາະສົມ
meaning list.sentence: That dress really suits you.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຄື່ອງນຸ່ງນັ້ນເຫມາະສົມກັບເຈົ້າແທ້ໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ເໝາະ, ເໝາະ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This movie is suitable for all ages.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບເງົານີ້ແມ່ນເຫມາະສົມສໍາລັບທຸກເພດທຸກໄວ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫຼຸບ
meaning list.sentence: Can you summarize the main points of the meeting?
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານສາມາດສະຫຼຸບຈຸດຕົ້ນຕໍຂອງກອງປະຊຸມໄດ້ບໍ?

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫຼຸບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He gave a brief summary of the project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ໃຫ້ບົດສະຫຼຸບສັ້ນໆຂອງໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະໜອງ, ສະໜອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The supply of fresh water is critical in this region.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສະຫນອງນ້ໍາຈືດແມ່ນມີຄວາມສໍາຄັນຫຼາຍໃນພາກພື້ນນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ສະໜອງ, ສະໜອງ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: They supplied food to the disaster victims.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ສະໜອງ​ອາຫານ​ໃຫ້​ຜູ້​ປະສົບ​ເຄາະ​ຮ້າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫນັບສະຫນູນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The politician's supporters cheered during the rally.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ສະໜັບສະໜຸນ​ນັກ​ການ​ເມືອງ​ໄດ້​ພາກັນ​ຊົມ​ເຊີຍ​ໃນ​ລະຫວ່າງ​ການ​ໂຮມ​ຊຸມນຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ແນ່ນອນ, ແນ່ນອນ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: Surely, you can see the importance of this decision.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແນ່ນອນເຈົ້າສາມາດເຫັນຄວາມສໍາຄັນຂອງການຕັດສິນໃຈນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ພື້ນຜິວ
meaning list.sentence: The surface of the table was clean and polished.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພື້ນຜິວຂອງຕາຕະລາງແມ່ນສະອາດແລະຂັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອຄວາມຢູ່ລອດ, ເພື່ອກໍາຈັດ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The plants survived the harsh winter.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພືດໄດ້ລອດຊີວິດຈາກລະດູຫນາວທີ່ຮຸນແຮງ.

meaning list.meaning: ລອຍ
meaning list.sentence: We had a swim in the lake during the summer.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາລອຍຢູ່ໃນທະເລສາບໃນລະດູຮ້ອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປ່ຽນ
meaning list.sentence: She switched the light off before leaving the room.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວປິດໄຟກ່ອນທີ່ຈະອອກຈາກຫ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັນຍານ, ອາການ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: A fever is a common symptom of the flu.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາການໄຂ້ເປັນອາການທົ່ວໄປຂອງໄຂ້ຫວັດໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຫາງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The dog wagged its tail happily.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໝາແກວ່ງຫາງຢ່າງມີຄວາມສຸກ.

meaning list.meaning: ພອນສະຫວັນ
meaning list.sentence: She has a natural talent for painting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີພອນສະຫວັນທໍາມະຊາດສໍາລັບການແຕ້ມຮູບ.

meaning list.meaning: ພອນສະຫວັນ
meaning list.sentence: He is a talented musician who plays multiple instruments.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ເປັນ​ນັກ​ດົນ​ຕີ​ທີ່​ມີ​ພອນ​ສະ​ຫວັນ​ທີ່​ຫຼິ້ນ​ເຄື່ອງ​ດົນ​ຕີ​ຫຼາຍ​ຢ່າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເທບ, cassette (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She used tape to seal the box.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໃຊ້ tape ເພື່ອປະທັບຕາກ່ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ພາສີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The government increased the tax on cigarettes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດ​ຖະ​ບານ​ເພີ່ມ​ພາ​ສີ​ອາ​ກອນ​ຢາ​ສູບ.

meaning list.meaning: ພາສີ
meaning list.sentence: The authorities decided to tax luxury items.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຫນ້າທີ່ຕັດສິນໃຈເກັບພາສີສິນຄ້າຫລູຫລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຕັກນິກ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The engineer provided a detailed technical explanation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວິສະວະກອນໄດ້ໃຫ້ຄໍາອະທິບາຍດ້ານວິຊາການຢ່າງລະອຽດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຕັກນິກ, ວິທີການ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He used a special technique to solve the problem.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໃຊ້ເຕັກນິກພິເສດເພື່ອແກ້ໄຂບັນຫາ.

meaning list.meaning: ມັກ, ມັກ (ພະຍັນຊະນະ)
meaning list.sentence: Children tend to learn languages faster than adults.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍມີແນວໂນ້ມທີ່ຈະຮຽນຮູ້ພາສາໄວກວ່າຜູ້ໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: tent (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: We set up the tent near the lake for camping.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຮົາ​ຕັ້ງ​ຜ້າ​ເຕັ້ນ​ຢູ່​ໃກ້​ກັບ​ທະ​ເລ​ສາບ​ເພື່ອ​ໄປ​ຕັ້ງ​ຄ້າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັ້ນ​ແມ່ນ​ມັນ, that much (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: I didn’t think it would be that difficult.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍບໍ່ຄິດວ່າມັນຈະເປັນເລື່ອງຍາກນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າ
meaning list.sentence: The house next to ours is theirs.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂອງພວກເຂົາແມ່ນເຮືອນທີ່ຢູ່ໃກ້ກັບພວກເຮົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫົວຂໍ້, ຫົວຂໍ້ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The theme of the exhibition is modern art.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫົວຂໍ້ຂອງງານວາງສະແດງແມ່ນສິລະປະທີ່ທັນສະໄຫມ.

meaning list.meaning: ທິດສະດີ, ທິດສະດີ
meaning list.sentence: Einstein’s theory of relativity changed physics forever.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທິດສະດີສົມທຽບຂອງ Einstein ໄດ້ປ່ຽນຟີຊິກຕະຫຼອດໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ດັ່ງນັ້ນ, ດັ່ງນັ້ນ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: She was ill; therefore, she couldn’t attend the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຈັບ; ດັ່ງນັ້ນ, ລາວບໍ່ສາມາດເຂົ້າຮ່ວມກອງປະຊຸມໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ນັ້ນ​ແມ່ນ​ມັນ (adverb​)
meaning list.sentence: I didn’t expect it to be this easy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍບໍ່ໄດ້ຄາດຫວັງວ່າມັນຈະງ່າຍແບບນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ແຕ່, ຍັງ (ສົມທົບ)
meaning list.sentence: She stayed late at work, though she was feeling tired.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຢູ່ຊ້າໃນການເຮັດວຽກເຖິງແມ່ນວ່າລາວຮູ້ສຶກເມື່ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຖິງແມ່ນວ່າ, ເຖິງແມ່ນວ່າ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: It’s a good plan, though it needs some improvement.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເປັນແຜນການທີ່ດີ, ເຖິງແມ່ນວ່າມັນຕ້ອງການການປັບປຸງບາງຢ່າງ.

meaning list.meaning: Bosphorus
meaning list.sentence: He had a sore throat and couldn’t speak properly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄໍຂອງລາວເຈັບ ແລະເວົ້າບໍ່ຖືກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕະຫຼອດ, ຕະຫຼອດ (preposition)
meaning list.sentence: The campaign was successful throughout the country.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂະບວນການດັ່ງກ່າວປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດໃນທົ່ວປະເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕະຫຼອດ, ຕະຫຼອດ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: She remained calm throughout the discussion.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຍັງຄົງສະຫງົບຕະຫຼອດການໂຕ້ຖຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ແໜ້ນ, ແຄບ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The lid on the jar was too tight to open.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຝາປິດໃສ່ກະປ໋ອງປິດແຫນ້ນເກີນໄປທີ່ຈະເປີດໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຈົນກ່ວາ (conjunction / preposition)
meaning list.sentence: I will wait till you finish your work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຈະລໍຖ້າຈົນກວ່າລາວຈະສຳເລັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່ອງ, ກົ່ວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He opened a tin of beans for dinner.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປີດກະປ໋ອງຖົ່ວສໍາລັບຄ່ໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ນ້ອຍໆ, ນ້ອຍໆ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The baby’s hands are so tiny.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມືຂອງເດັກນ້ອຍແມ່ນນ້ອຍຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຄ້ງລົງ, ໂຄ້ງ
meaning list.sentence: The chair tipped over when he leaned back too far.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເມື່ອ​ລາວ​ເອົ້າ​ໄປ​ຂ້າງ​ຫຼັງ​ຫຼາຍ​ເກີນ​ໄປ, ຕັ່ງ​ໄດ້​ຢຽບ​ລົງ.

meaning list.meaning: toe (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He stubbed his toe on the edge of the table.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ stubbed ຕີນຂອງຕົນກ່ຽວກັບແຂບຂອງຕາຕະລາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ພາສາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She bit her tongue while eating.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວບິດລີ້ນຂອງລາວໃນຂະນະທີ່ກິນອາຫານ.

meaning list.meaning: ທັງໝົດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The total cost of the trip was higher than expected.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄ່າໃຊ້ຈ່າຍທັງຫມົດຂອງການເດີນທາງແມ່ນສູງກວ່າທີ່ຄາດໄວ້.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມບູນ, ສົມບູນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: It was a total surprise to see him at the party.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເປັນຄວາມແປກໃຈທີ່ສົມບູນທີ່ຈະເຫັນລາວຢູ່ໃນງານລ້ຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມບູນ, ສົມບູນ
