meaning list.sentence: I totally agree with your opinion.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍເຫັນດີກັບຄວາມຄິດເຫັນຂອງເຈົ້າຢ່າງສົມບູນ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຕະ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The baby responded to her mother’s gentle touch.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍຕອບສະຫນອງຕໍ່ການສໍາພັດທີ່ອ່ອນໂຍນຂອງແມ່ຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄປທ່ຽວ, ໄປທ່ຽວ
meaning list.sentence: They toured the museum during their visit.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ໄປຢ້ຽມຢາມພິພິທະພັນໃນລະຫວ່າງການຢ້ຽມຢາມຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຄ້າ
meaning list.sentence: International trade is vital for the economy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ຄ້າ​ສາ​ກົນ​ແມ່ນ​ມີ​ຄວາມ​ສໍາ​ຄັນ​ຕໍ່​ເສດ​ຖະ​ກິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊື້ຂາຍ
meaning list.sentence: They traded goods with neighboring countries.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ແລກປ່ຽນ​ສິນຄ້າ​ກັບ​ປະ​ເທດ​ເພື່ອນ​ບ້ານ.

meaning list.meaning: ແປ​ພາ​ສາ
meaning list.sentence: She translated the document from French to English.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແປເອກະສານຈາກຝຣັ່ງເປັນພາສາອັງກິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ແປຄຳອະທິບາຍກັບຄືນເປັນ ອັງກິດ (ສະຫະລັດ) ແປພາສາ
meaning list.sentence: The translation of the book was well received.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ແປ​ພາ​ສາ​ຂອງ​ປຶ້ມ​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ການ​ຍົກ​ຍ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ພົກພາ, ໂອນ (ພະຍັນຊະນະ)
meaning list.sentence: Goods are transported by truck across the country.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ຂົນ​ສົ່ງ​ສິນ​ຄ້າ​ໂດຍ​ລົດ​ບັນ​ທຸກ​ໃນ​ທົ່ວ​ປະ​ເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ປິ່ນປົວ, ປິ່ນປົວ
meaning list.sentence: Doctors treated her injury with care.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານໝໍປິ່ນປົວບາດແຜຂອງລາວຢ່າງລະມັດລະວັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການປິ່ນປົວ, ການປິ່ນປົວ
meaning list.sentence: She is undergoing treatment for her illness.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບການປິ່ນປົວພະຍາດຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ແນວໂນ້ມ, ຄົນອັບເດດ:
meaning list.sentence: The current trend in fashion emphasizes sustainability.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແນວໂນ້ມໃນປະຈຸບັນຂອງຄົນອັບເດດ: ເນັ້ນຫນັກໃສ່ຄວາມຍືນຍົງ.

meaning list.meaning: trick, trick (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He performed a magic trick for the children.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພຣະອົງໄດ້ປະຕິບັດ trick magic ສໍາລັບເດັກນ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼອກລວງ, ຫຼອກລວງ
meaning list.sentence: They tricked him into signing the document.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ຫຼອກລວງໃຫ້ລາວລົງນາມໃນເອກະສານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຈິງ, ຄວາມຈິງ
meaning list.sentence: She always tells the truth, no matter the situation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍ່ວ່າສະຖານະການໃດກໍ່ຕາມ, ລາວສະເຫມີບອກຄວາມຈິງ.

meaning list.meaning: ທໍ່, ທໍ່ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The toothpaste comes in a tube.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຢາສີຟັນມາຢູ່ໃນທໍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຂຽນ
meaning list.sentence: She typed the report on her computer.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຂຽນບົດລາຍງານໃນຄອມພິວເຕີຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດຍ​ປົກ​ກະ​ຕິ​, ໂດຍ​ປົກ​ກະ​ຕິ (adverb​)
meaning list.sentence: The restaurant is typically crowded on weekends.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປົກກະຕິແລ້ວຮ້ານອາຫານແມ່ນແອອັດໃນທ້າຍອາທິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢາງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He replaced the flat tyre with a spare one.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ປ່ຽນຢາງຢາງທີ່ຮາບພຽງດ້ວຍຢາງສຳຮອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ugly (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The building is functional but considered ugly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຄານຖືກພິຈາລະນາທີ່ເປັນປະໂຫຍດແຕ່ຂີ້ຮ້າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່​ສາ​ມາດ, ບໍ່​ສາ​ມາດ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: He was unable to attend the meeting due to illness.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ບໍ່​ສາມາດ​ເຂົ້າ​ຮ່ວມ​ກອງ​ປະຊຸມ​ໄດ້​ຍ້ອນ​ພະຍາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ສະບາຍ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The chairs in the waiting room were uncomfortable.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕັ່ງນັ່ງຢູ່ໃນຫ້ອງລໍຖ້າບໍ່ສະບາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊຸດຊັ້ນໃນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She bought a set of new underwear.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງໄດ້ຊື້ຊຸດຊັ້ນໃນຊຸດໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຫວ່າງງານ
meaning list.sentence: He has been unemployed for over six months.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຫວ່າງງານຫຼາຍກວ່າຫົກເດືອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫວ່າງງານ
meaning list.sentence: The government is working to reduce unemployment.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານກໍາລັງເຮັດວຽກເພື່ອຫຼຸດຜ່ອນການຫວ່າງງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ຍຸດຕິທຳ, ບໍ່ຍຸດຕິທຳ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The decision was considered unfair by many.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ຕັດສິນ​ໃຈ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ຖືກ​ຖື​ວ່າ​ບໍ່​ຍຸດຕິ​ທຳ​ໂດຍ​ຫຼາຍ​ຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫະພັນ, ສະຫະພັນ
meaning list.sentence: The workers formed a union to negotiate better wages.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄົນງານໄດ້ສ້າງຕັ້ງສະຫະພັນເພື່ອເຈລະຈາເພື່ອຄ່າຈ້າງທີ່ດີກວ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: -mediz, -mezse (ການ​ເຊື່ອມ​ໂຍງ​)
meaning list.sentence: You won’t succeed unless you work harder.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານບໍ່ສາມາດປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດໄດ້ເວັ້ນເສຍແຕ່ວ່າທ່ານເຮັດວຽກຫນັກກວ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ເຫມືອນກັບ, ໃນທາງກົງກັນຂ້າມ (preposition)
meaning list.sentence: Unlike his brother, he prefers staying indoors.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍ່ຄືກັບອ້າຍຂອງລາວ, ລາວມັກຢູ່ພາຍໃນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄົງ​ຈະ​ບໍ່​ເປັນ​ໄປ​ໄດ້ (adjective​)
meaning list.sentence: It’s unlikely that it will rain today.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນຄົງຈະບໍ່ເປັນຝົນໃນມື້ນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່​ຈໍາ​ເປັນ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: You should avoid making unnecessary comments.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຄວນຫຼີກເວັ້ນການອອກຄໍາເຫັນທີ່ບໍ່ຈໍາເປັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ພໍໃຈ, ບໍ່ພໍໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: The smell in the room was very unpleasant.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກິ່ນຫອມໃນຫ້ອງແມ່ນບໍ່ເປັນສຸກຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ປັບປຸງ
meaning list.sentence: The software needs to be updated regularly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊອບແວຕ້ອງໄດ້ຮັບການປັບປຸງເປັນປົກກະຕິ.

meaning list.meaning: ອັບເດດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The latest update includes new features.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປັບປຸງຫລ້າສຸດປະກອບມີຄຸນສົມບັດໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຕາມ, ຕາມ (preposition)
meaning list.sentence: The decision was made upon careful consideration.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຕັດສິນໃຈໄດ້ຖືກປະຕິບັດຫຼັງຈາກພິຈາລະນາຢ່າງລະມັດລະວັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂສກເສົ້າ, ໃຈຮ້າຍ
meaning list.sentence: She was upset after hearing the bad news.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮູ້ສຶກເສຍໃຈຫຼັງຈາກໄດ້ຍິນຂ່າວຮ້າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: upset (ຄຳ​ກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The sudden change in plans upset everyone.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປ່ຽນແປງຢ່າງກະທັນຫັນໃນແຜນການເຮັດໃຫ້ທຸກຄົນ upset.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຊ້, ມືສອງ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He bought a used car instead of a new one.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຊື້ລົດມືສອງແທນລົດໃໝ່.

meaning list.meaning: ມີຄ່າ, ມີຄ່າ
meaning list.sentence: This necklace is very valuable to her.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສາຍຄໍນີ້ມີມູນຄ່າຫຼາຍສໍາລັບລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄ່າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The value of the house has increased significantly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມູນຄ່າຂອງເຮືອນໄດ້ເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕ່າງໆ, ທີ່ແຕກຕ່າງກັນ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: She has various interests, including music and sports.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຫຼາຍຄວາມສົນໃຈ, ລວມທັງດົນຕີແລະກິລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ລຸ້ນ, ສະບັບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This is the updated version of the software.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນີ້ແມ່ນສະບັບປັບປຸງຂອງຊອບແວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ຖືກເຄາະຮ້າຍ, ຜູ້ເຄາະຮ້າຍ
meaning list.sentence: The victim of the accident was taken to the hospital.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້​ເຄາະ​ຮ້າຍ​ຈາກ​ອຸ​ບັດ​ຕິ​ເຫດ​ໄດ້​ຖືກ​ນໍາ​ໄປ​ໂຮງ​ຫມໍ​.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອເບິ່ງ, ເບິ່ງ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: We viewed the paintings in the art gallery.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຮົາ​ໄດ້​ເບິ່ງ​ຮູບ​ແຕ້ມ​ໃນ​ຫ້ອງ​ສະ​ແດງ​ສິ​ລະ​ປະ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ຊົມ
meaning list.sentence: The show attracted millions of viewers worldwide.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາຍການດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ດຶງດູດຜູ້ຊົມຫຼາຍລ້ານຄົນໃນທົ່ວໂລກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮຸນແຮງ, ຮຸນແຮງ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The movie contains scenes of violent conflict.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບເງົາປະກອບມີ scenes ຂອງຄວາມຂັດແຍ້ງທີ່ຮຸນແຮງ.

meaning list.meaning: ອາສາສະໝັກ
meaning list.sentence: Many volunteers helped during the disaster relief efforts.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາສາສະໝັກຫຼາຍຄົນໄດ້ຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອໃນຄວາມພະຍາຍາມບັນເທົາໄພພິບັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ອາສາສະໝັກ
meaning list.sentence: She volunteered to organize the event.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວອາສາສະໝັກຈັດງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົງຄະແນນສຽງ
meaning list.sentence: The candidate won the majority of the votes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ສະໝັກໄດ້ຮັບຄະແນນສຽງສ່ວນຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົງຄະແນນສຽງ
meaning list.sentence: They voted for a new leader in the election.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ລົງຄະແນນສຽງສໍາລັບຜູ້ນໍາຄົນໃຫມ່ໃນການເລືອກຕັ້ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຮ້ອນ
meaning list.sentence: She warmed her hands by the fire.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພຣະອົງໄດ້ອົບອຸ່ນມືຂອງລາວໂດຍໄຟ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕັກເຕືອນ
meaning list.sentence: The teacher warned the students about cheating.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູສອນເຕືອນນັກຮຽນກ່ຽວກັບການໂກງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຳເຕືອນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The weather forecast issued a storm warning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະຍາກອນອາກາດໄດ້ເຕືອນວ່າຈະມີພາຍຸ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂີ້ເຫຍື້ອ, ຂີ້ເຫຍື້ອ
meaning list.sentence: Recycling helps reduce waste.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການລີໄຊເຄີນຊ່ວຍຫຼຸດຜ່ອນສິ່ງເສດເຫຼືອ.

meaning list.meaning: ເສດ
meaning list.sentence: Don’t waste your time on unimportant tasks.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຢ່າເສຍເວລາໃຫ້ກັບວຽກທີ່ບໍ່ສຳຄັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫວ່າງເປົ່າ, ຫວ່າງເປົ່າ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The land was covered with waste materials.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທີ່ດິນໄດ້ຖືກປົກຄຸມດ້ວຍສິ່ງເສດເຫຼືອ.

meaning list.meaning: ນ້ຳ
meaning list.sentence: She watered the plants every morning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຫົດ​ນ້ຳ​ຕົ້ນ​ໄມ້​ທຸກໆ​ເຊົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈັບມື
meaning list.sentence: He waved goodbye to his friends at the station.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໂບກມືລາກັບໝູ່ຂອງລາວຢູ່ສະຖານີ.

meaning list.meaning: ອາວຸດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The police found a weapon at the crime scene.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຳຫຼວດພົບປືນຢູ່ບ່ອນເກີດເຫດ.

meaning list.meaning: ນ້ຳໜັກ, ນ້ຳໜັກ
meaning list.sentence: She weighs herself every morning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຊັ່ງນໍ້າຫນັກຕົນເອງທຸກເຊົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕາເວັນຕົກ, ເປັນຂອງຕາເວັນຕົກ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Western culture has influenced many parts of the world.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວັດທະນະທໍາຕາເວັນຕົກໄດ້ມີອິດທິພົນຫຼາຍພາກສ່ວນຂອງໂລກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ່າງໃດກໍຕາມ, ໃດກໍ່ຕາມ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: You can choose whatever you like.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານສາມາດເລືອກອັນໃດກໍໄດ້ທີ່ທ່ານຕ້ອງການ.

meaning list.meaning: - ເມື່ອ​ໃດ​, ເມື່ອ​ໃດ (ການ​ເຊື່ອມ​ຕໍ່​)
meaning list.sentence: You can call me whenever you need help.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າສາມາດໂທຫາຂ້ອຍໄດ້ທຸກເວລາທີ່ທ່ານຕ້ອງການຄວາມຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ວ່າຈະເປັນ (ການເຊື່ອມຕໍ່)
meaning list.sentence: She asked whether he was coming to the party.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຖາມວ່າລາວຈະມາພັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄລຍະໜຶ່ງ
meaning list.sentence: It’s been a while since we last met.
meaning list.sentence translation: ດົນໆແລ້ວທີ່ເຮົາພົບກັນຄັ້ງສຸດທ້າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ທັງ​ຫມົດ​, ທັງ​ຫມົດ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: They spent the whole day at the beach.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າໃຊ້ເວລາໝົດມື້ຢູ່ຫາດຊາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈະ, ຄວາມປາຖະຫນາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her strong will helped her overcome the difficulties.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມເຂັ້ມແຂງຂອງລາວຈະຊ່ວຍໃຫ້ລາວຜ່ານຜ່າຄວາມຫຍຸ້ງຍາກ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄຊຊະນະ, ໄຊຊະນະ
meaning list.sentence: The team celebrated their win in the championship.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທີມງານສະເຫຼີມສະຫຼອງໄຊຊະນະຂອງພວກເຂົາໃນແຊ້ມ.

meaning list.meaning: ປີກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The bird flapped its wings and took off.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນົກ​ກະ​ພິບ​ປີກ​ຂອງ​ມັນ​ແລະ​ໄດ້​ອອກ​ໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃນ, ພາຍໃນ (preposition)
meaning list.sentence: The work must be completed within two weeks.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວຽກງານດັ່ງກ່າວຕ້ອງສໍາເລັດພາຍໃນສອງອາທິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ອັດສະຈັນ
meaning list.sentence: I wonder what the weather will be like tomorrow.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍສົງໄສວ່າອາກາດຈະເປັນແນວໃດໃນມື້ອື່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ອັດສະຈັນ, ອັດສະຈັນ
meaning list.sentence: The pyramids are a wonder of ancient architecture.
meaning list.sentence translation: Pyramids ແມ່ນຄວາມມະຫັດສະຈັນຂອງສະຖາປັດຕະຍະກໍາບູຮານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂົນສັດ
meaning list.sentence: This sweater is made of 100% wool.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເສື້ອກັນໜາວນີ້ແມ່ນເຮັດຈາກຂົນສັດ 100%.

meaning list.meaning: ທົ່ວໂລກ
meaning list.sentence: The company has a worldwide reputation for quality.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດມີຊື່ສຽງທົ່ວໂລກກ່ຽວກັບຄຸນນະພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ທົ່ວໂລກ
meaning list.sentence: The film was released worldwide last month.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບເງົາດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຖືກປ່ອຍອອກມາໃນທົ່ວໂລກໃນເດືອນແລ້ວນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມກັງວົນ, ຄວາມກັງວົນ
meaning list.sentence: Her biggest worry is about her family’s safety.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມກັງວົນທີ່ໃຫຍ່ທີ່ສຸດຂອງລາວແມ່ນຄວາມປອດໄພຂອງຄອບຄົວຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮ້າຍແຮງຂຶ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: The weather got worse as the day progressed.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາກາດ​ຮ້າຍ​ແຮງ​ຂຶ້ນ​ເມື່ອ​ມື້​ນັບ​ມື້​ນັບ​ກ້າວ​ໜ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂີ້ຮ້າຍທີ່ສຸດ
meaning list.sentence: That was the worst experience of my life.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນີ້ແມ່ນປະສົບການທີ່ຮ້າຍແຮງທີ່ສຸດຂອງຊີວິດຂອງຂ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມຄວນ, ສົມຄວນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This book is worth reading.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫນັງສືເຫຼັ້ມນີ້ມີມູນຄ່າການອ່ານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂຽນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The contract must be in written form.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສັນຍາຕ້ອງເປັນລາຍລັກອັກສອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜິດ, ຜິດ
meaning list.sentence: You answered the question wrong.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຕອບຄຳຖາມບໍ່ຖືກຕ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສວນ, ເດີ່ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The children are playing in the yard.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍກໍາລັງຫຼີ້ນຢູ່ໃນສວນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫນຸ່ມ, ຊາວຫນຸ່ມ
meaning list.sentence: The young today are very interested in technology.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະຈຸ​ບັນ, ​ໄວ​ໜຸ່ມ​ມີ​ຄວາມ​ສົນ​ໃຈ​ຫຼາຍ​ດ້ານ​ເຕັກ​ໂນ​ໂລ​ຊີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊາວໜຸ່ມ, ປະຊາກອນໄວໜຸ່ມ
meaning list.sentence: His youth was spent traveling and exploring new places.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໃຊ້ເວລາໄວຫນຸ່ມຂອງລາວເດີນທາງແລະຄົ້ນຫາສະຖານທີ່ໃຫມ່.
